It was also the day we had to check out but once again they came to the rescue finding the best price for another room on their website instead of just putting us on the rack rate.They also liaised with a supplier to get her a wheelchair when she came out of hospital - I couldn’t have thanked them enough!We had room service that night - just a club sandwich but it was tasty and flavoursome and not bad price for room service at 9.50€ - it came with a huge bowl of crisps.The breakfast here though was amazing - get the rate including breakfast as it will last you through lunch and all the way to dinner. Check my pictures but it doesn’t do it justice.... the bespoke omelettes are to die for!Planning another trip to Barcelona next year but will only stay here!!
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, friendly service, very comfortable and decently-sized rooms. Breakfast was definitely on the expensive side, but plenty of cafes nearby. Easy to get to the airport and elsewhere in Barcelona and surroundings.
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel in good central location.Just a little disappointed with the room size. We had the internal facing room and it's not big enough for two suitcases without having to step over them.Rooftop pool was nice but also small and gets crowded with just a handful of people.The outside beer garden is really nice and a good place for a cocktail and to get away form the bustling centre of Barcelona.Would stay again but on an outward facing room with balcony. But maybe the price will go up and there would be better options?
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As soon as I walked in the hotel I was already in love, so much beautiful art on the walls & the interior was so sophisticated.. the staff looked so well dressed and welcomed you with a smile which is always promising.Our room was perfect with a cot already made up for my baby, and tv had an English option! Each floor of the hotel is based on a certain artist and their work which was fascinating.. and it just got a lot better when we went on the top floor & stubbled across a pool sweet little pool & gym.Breakfast here was amazing.. so yummy & plenty to choose from..the chefs clearly take pride in presentation cause it all looked 5*I would highly recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was absolutely perfect for our first stay in Barcelona! It was modern, central and the friendly staff made us feel very welcome. Yes the rooms are on the small side but you don’t feel claustrophobic like some of these reviews make out. It’s close to lots of bars and restaurants and near to the metro station if you want to travel further in to the city. I can’t recommend this place enough!
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a nice and pleasant hotel. Unlike the luxury hotels we usually stay at, it is unique in its design and decorations. The location is very good, there are many good restaurants nearby. We had the terrace room, which has a balcony that leads to a big backyard. It's lovely!Special praise to Helena, who is very helpful and patient in giving us directions and advice on restaurants nearby. She is the most friendly staff at the hotel. We will stay there again if we visit Barcelona next year!
hotelName:
1    H10 Art Gallery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed for a week in August with our 10 and 7 year olds and really enjoyed this hotel. From the moment you enter, you are met with modern, sleek decor. Check in was efficient and friendly. We had 2 adjoining rooms and were so impressed by how stylish, spacious and comfortable they were. We ate numerous times in the restaurant and lobby bar and found the food to not only be tasty but incredibly good value.We all loved the rooftop pool and found it reasonably easy to get sunbeds. We found at this hotel, I suppose with it being a city location as opposed to a beach resort that even when it was busy, it wouldn't take long for loungers to become available. I would highly recommend and would definitely return.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 3 nights in early September. The hotel is easy to find (every taxi driver we used knew where it was) and a taxi from Barcelona Santa train station is c€15.All hotel staff were friendly and helpful with incredible English. Decor of the hotel is very modern and chic. Great use of colour and pattern from the living walls in the restaurant, the artwork in the bedrooms and the varied seating areas on the rooftop. Hotel is very close to Basilica De la Sagrada Familia (c5-10min walk). Worth noting the tour buses have a stop there so very convenient should you want to use these.We hadn’t booked breakfast but ended up eating there everyday. Restaurant is again very modern in design and the variety and quality of the buffet is very good. We had a soggy afternoon during our stay but the hotel were able to lend us umbrellas. Nothing felt like a problem here. Rooftop was beautiful with great view of the Basilica and plenty of loungers/seats to capture the sun throughout the day. The pool wasn’t huge but perfect for a gentle swim to cool off. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent a Saturday night here in mid-July ahead of a week's cruise departing from Barcelona.This place is a real hidden gem- it's not far from the Sagrada Familia but you would think you are in a quite suburb rather then in the centre of a major European city. From the moment we arrived the staff were warm and welcoming, and we really impressed with the original design features of the hotel and the unusual furniture. Our room was also attractively decorated and spotlessly clean. We made use of the rooftop pool which has some great views over the city, and also went to the 5pm wine and cheese tasting in the main bar (be warned though- they only keep it out for 15 minutes). We didn't have dinner there but had breakfast the next day where there was a wide range of hot and cold dishes and service was very efficient. Overall very impressed and seriously good value for money.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful hotel with fantastic amenities. Pool area is great and open until 9pm along with the terrace, Gerard was amazing bringing drinks to everyone he didn’t stop the whole time we were out by the pool.Rooms very nice, we had a mix up with our room I had booked a family room, we wanted the space and a large suite. When we checked into our room we found we had been allocated a triple room. This was adequately resolved but the room I booked had been given to a family of 4, they explanation that we were a family of 3 and had been moved wasn’t a relevant arguement in my opinion. We booked and paid for the suite we should have been allocated it. If I had been contacted before hand and told I was being moved to a triple and the price reduced to the price of a triple room I wouldn’t have argued and would have happily moved. Annoyingly the triple wasn’t even available to book when I made my booking!But alas the issue was resolved and it didn’t affect our stay and it wouldn’t stop me returning.The hotel is in a great location plenty of restaurants around and close to Sagrada Familia and metro stops.Would definitely return to this beautiful hotel. Thank you for a great stay.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I’m surprised by the super high ratings this hotel has. It was nice and if there was a 3.5 button maybe but no more. The rooms are clean and the beds comfortable. The air conditioner is weak and does not cool your room adequately. The upstairs pool is nice but you have to pay 5 Euro each for a pool towel and when you bring it back to the front desk even if you have the towels they wont give you your money back without a paper stub they give you. Hold onto that. There is no washroom by the pool. The front desk staff were generally nice but I have seen much better when we are talking 5 ratings. The lower level of the hotel is well done with a good outdoor sitting area. If I were to return to Barcelona I don’t feel that this would be my choice again. I would stay closer to the park. It just did not live up to its ratings.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited as a group of 3 girls and booked a triple room, this seemed to be a wheelchair accessible room which obviously had enough space for an extra bed. Room was lovely, plenty of hanging space for clothes and comfy beds - the only issue was the bathroom didn’t have ‘proper’ doors on only glass sliding doors so had some limited privacy. The lobby area is gorgeous with lovey furnishings and free wine and cheese at 5pm was a nice touch. We booked room only but had the buffet breakfast for two mornings which for €15 a head we thought wasn’t bad! There is a gym which mainly has cardio equipment. The rooftop pool was a lovely place to hang out for a few hours! The hotel has made the most out of the area with sun loungers and different seating areas, there is definitely a lack of a bar - but assume this is the case as it is a residential area. They did have a waiter around who could go down and get drinks from the lobby bar if you wanted so not too much of an issue.The location is fantastic to get to the Sagrada about 5 mins away, but is about 40mins walk to La Rambla - we mainly took taxis which was ok between us at around €10 a trip.We would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was not a guest at this hotel but my friend was, so I visited here several times. Nice lobby, good drinks and service. Good location (central). This is where I would stay if I come back to Barcelona.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a conference with about 40 persons in May this year and I have to say that Hotel Barcelona provided the best service and a perfect stay for us. We all LOVED it!Not only was it a perfect fit for our brand/company, but also the service was extraordinary! The communication and planning prior to the conference was super easy and very professional, they made sure that all our requirements and needs were met. Also some extra wishes and last minute changes were no problem.The staff throughout the hotel (reception, conference center, restaurant, etc.) was very professional, we always had several persons around us that assisted with whatever we needed. We had a conference package with lunches and tea breaks and the food and drinks were excellent!We all loved the design of the hotel, the rooftop terrace for some free time, the breakfast lounge with the beautiful greenery! And the location was perfect to start afternoon activities and sightseeing.We thank the entire hotel and Daniel for the support and to have made our 3 days at Hotel Barcelona 1882 unforgettable. Hope to see you soon again!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel's location was safe and clean in the daytime, less so at night. Our room for three was extra large with pleanty of space for luggage and the extra bed. There was a strange bathroom arrangement. It was in the room with only opaque glass walls that you could see right through. Made it very uncomfortable for us as we were traveling with our teenaged daughter. The breakfast wasn't included, but worth the price. It had a full scale buffet with excellent coffee. The restaurant was clean and the seating was always available.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel, easy walking distance from the Sagrada Familia, where there is also a Metro station giving access to and from the rest of the city.Everything in the rooms is modern and finished to a high standard. Comfortable beds and fully supplied bathroom area.Staff were all friendly and helpful.The buffet breakfast was excellent, and plentiful. We fuelled up there for the day and didn't have much need for lunch after that.Food served in the bar (or to room service) was nice too, and cheaper than eating out at most of the restaurants in the surrounding streets.The rooftop pool is nice, but very small. It only took a couple of boisterous children to overwhelm it. The terrace is a pleasant spot to sit and relax for a while, even if the 'selfie point' doesn't have as good a view of the Sagrada Familia as you might expect from the hotel's description.Tourist tip - even if you wouldn't dream of exercising on holiday, the ground floor gym has a machine where you can fill your water bottle with chilly water before heading out into the heat!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We couldn't be happier with this hotel - modern, classy, spotlessly clean, helpful staff.It's very close to Sagrada Familia and we pretty much walked everywhere from here exploring the city.Nothing nicer than having a rooftop pool to relax by at the end of a day's sightseeing. The breakfast choices are extensive and there is plenty to eat by way of snacks etc. There is a lovely quiet terrace as well as comfy seats in air conditioned comfort.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for three nights following a cruise. The staff couldn't have been more helpful; they helped arrange for a private transfer from the ship to the hotel and, at the end of our stay, to the airport. Room was clean, modern, and very comfortable. True, the a/c won't come on unless you are in the room, but the hotel prides itself on LEED Gold standard so this is totally understandable. If you're there on a Saturday night don't miss the free one hour tour of the neighborhood focusing on Sagrada Familia. Our guide Juan was delightful. Every night at 5 there's a brief wine and cheese tasting (guests are limited to one glass of wine and the cheese disappears after 15 minutes so don't be late). Morning buffet breakfast (15 euros) is very worthwhile, and even includes champagne. Wednesday morning there's a free yoga class in the gym. Bikes and umbrellas are available for loan. We will certainly recommend this to others and will book this again if we return to Barcelona.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed our stay at this modern and contemporary hotel. The location is walkable to many points of interests (30-40 mins travel time). The staff members are friendly and very helpful. The personalization of honouring our birthday with a complementary bottle was appreciated. There are many spaces to relax in a unique atmosphere - the rooftop seating/pool, the lobby bar, and terrace on -1. We were particularly impressed with the breakfast buffet, espresso, and menu salads. The finishes throughout the hotel are thoughtful, stylish, and luxurious. The fragrance in the lobby is fantastic! At check out we appreciated the time to review our hotel charges. A few things that would have made our stay better: 1. After a hot day of travelling, we would have liked the ability to cool down the room quicker. The AC is locked at 21C, the fan is faint, and the cleaning staff ensure the AC is off when the room is unattended.2. Having the privacy of an additional door between the washroom sink and the hallway/room. The open concept isn’t practical for more than one occupant. Overall a great stay and we would recommend.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent three nights at this hotel over the past week and had a great time. Reception staff were all friendly and lent me a converter when I realised I forgot to bring mine from Australia. My room was big and the bed very comfortable. Everything was perfectly clean. The highlight for me was the 7th floor with swimming pool and view of Sagrada familia. The pool was small but perfect to jump in and cool down quickly. I will certainly stay again next time I’m in Barcelona.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 1 night and had a pretty good experience. I loved the design of the room - modern, clean, spacious and plenty of storage. Rooftop pool was small with a limited amount of lounge chairs. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to order a drink in the evening on the rooftop deck because there was no one available to take drink orders. Also, the pool and rooftop close promptly at 9pm. Hotel is in a good location - walking distance to Sagrada Familia.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything in the hotel was best - great location, big and clean rooms, small but amazing pool with bar, beautiful sun roof terrace with nice flowers, comfortable beds, big, clean and modern bathroom!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My third time to visit Spain and exactly Barcelona. it was wonderful place to stay in Barcelona. Staff were helpful and friendly from the start to end. What imprinted this further was when I had an accident and broke my arm, their support with everything was phenomenal. The manager and the owner both found us to offer support and genuine concern. When the arm is better then we will definitely be back. This hotel made all the difference to what was almost a total disaster
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel in a great position for Sagrada and the metro. New and boutique like with a roof top swimming pool. I can’t praise the staff enough as I left some items in the room and they sent them back so quickly keeping me up dated - shout out to Jordi! They were so fantastic. Breakfast vast and food at other times very good. I would stay here again and again! A great addition to Barcelona!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Look no further than this modern hotel in a great location As soon as you arrive you will not be disappointed, and the rooms are excellentPool is a little small, but there is plenty of roof top space to sit with views across the city
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the minute we walked into the lobby, I knew we picked the right hotel. It smelled wonderful and was uniquely decorated. Location was great as it was a 5 minute walk to Sagrada Familiar. The room was a sufficient size and the entire hotel was spotless. The rooftop pool and lounge area was great. If I have one negative thing to say it will be that if they say Happy Hour is at 5pm, be there at 5pm because 5:15pm you are out of luck. Same with breakfast. Breakfast served until 10:30am and if you get there at 10am, what ever is left over is what you get. No additional items will be put out.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Modern facility w/very helpful staff. Inviting, spacious public areas including the top floor w/pool and direct views of Sagrada Familia ( a few blocks away). Neighborhood is mix of small businesses, apartments, bars and restaurants. PROS: Outstanding breakfast and dining area on the basement level. Very good King bed. Desk area & night stands were adequate CONS: Shower had no grab rail or safety mat and the floor was very slippery!Very modern, stylish sink and vanity were small & awkward. Rather small floor planAbout ten blocks walk to Pedrerra and 2 km. to Playa Catalunya
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located in a local area away from the fray of tourism. It's a nice hotel and the rooms are extremely clean. The views aren't lovely, but we didn't expect it. You are there to have a central, safe location with a nice room, not for views. The room was comfortable, good tv options, great shower, and the breakfast brunch was great! We loved the quality and selections. Sagrada Familia is a five-minute walk and there are taxis waiting outside the hotel if you choose to avoid the mass transit. We heard pickpocketing is horrific at the stations so we chose to use taxis. They were convenient and fairly reasonable. The fitness room had a glass wall so you could job on the treadmill and people watch. It was great! Highly recommend the hotel.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A hotel that is brand new, great crew, comfortable and large bedrooms, great bathrooms. The rooftop was the best place to relax in the whole city, fabulous pool, great seating area with a scenic view of the Sagrada Família . The crew was super helpful and great attitude.We will be back soon, very soon
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: from the minute that we checked in there was nothing but issues. we had been driving all day and finally arrived to the hotel. it was pouring outside, and we parked in front to check in and grab someone to help with the may bags that we had. although we were customers of the hotel, we got asked to move our car down the street. we also were told that no one can help us to our room with our bags as they do not do this service.at this piont we just wanted to check in and order food. we had to drive all the way around the very busy block to park our car in the hotel undergound. when we arrived there, the garage door would not work and the hotel intercom had no one answering it, therefore around the very busy block we had to go again. We then had to park the car down the block, run in the rain to get help with the parking then back around the busy block again. when we arrived in our room, it was very nice. we went to order room service and could not find the menu, when we phonen d the fron tdesk they explained that the menu was on the tv, fair enough. The menu was really not what we were expecting. all the food was health consious food that did not appeal to us, however we did go ahead and tried to order. we ordered 2 different things off the tv menu and the kitchen staff insisted that these items were not on the menu. we tried to explain that yes they were and we are looking right at them, even after we took a screen shot on our phone and showed them, they still insisted they did not make these items. after 30 minutes of back and forth i went across the street and got pizza as the hotel provided no vegetarian otions. my partner odered a sandwich in which the tomatoes were green. throughout our whole stay at this hotel they airconditioner did not work. The front desk sent several people up to try and fix it, but with no avail. the front desk staff we found less then understanding and gave a "i dont care" attitude.for the amount that we paid to stay here, it was one thing after another and we were very unhappy with this hotel.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for the last two nights of my vacation to Spain and I wished I had stayed here for my entire trip. The room was modern, spotless, and comfortable. Excellent service from the staff. The rooftop is absolutely gorgeous with a stunning view of Sagrada Familia. There are free yoga classes on Wednesdays, daily wine tastings, and the hotel food is actually quite good. It's in a quieter area, which I liked, and has easy access to the city center via metro. I will stay here again on my next trip to Barcelona for sure!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Newly refurbished, this hotel is superb. POSSIBLY could be considered to be slightly off the beaten track from the city centre, but issuperb value for money. Great views of the Sagrada Familia which is adjacent.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved this hotel. We are a family of four with two teenagers and stayed 4 nights.The room size was generous and the kids made up sofa bed was the size of a normal king size bed. Two sinks in bathroom helped.I believe there are only a few family rooms in the hotel so grab them while you can but wouldn’t take young children as not that type of hotel. Decor of whole hotel was stylish , makes you want to redecorate your own home.Roof top pool area is a fantastic facility - so calm and peaceful, lots of space and beds and great views. A few minor niggles - toilets not in use on roof top so had to go down 8 floors, no bar service by pool, bar area slightly brightly lit, long check out queue at midday - but for a four star hotel and for the price we paid, all this was very minor in the scheme of things.Want to come back (without teenagers!).
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very pleasant stay in this hotel very close to La Sagrada Família. Close to the metro and many cafes, restaurants and bars but a quiet and pleasant area. Staff friendly and helpful. Rooms clean and comfortable. Lovely roof top terrace. Would stay again
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked two rooms for three nights. Check-in was quick. Found the front desk personnel very professional, always eager to assist especially with great restaurant recommendations, and friendly (well most of them). A great lobby with a cool vibe. Fantastic rooftop pool and lounge area with a view of the Sagrada Familia. Rooms were nice sized and well appointed. Really nice, large bathrooms. As others have mentioned, the location is great for touring the Sagrada Familia, but is away from the old town and beach areas. With that said, there were always taxis in front of the hotel with rides typically 8-10 euros to get to most places. Will stay here again next time in Barcelona.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We absolutely love our stay at this hotel. They staff were very welcoming. I’d booked this through booking.com and was asked if the reason for staying was for work or Liesure I told them we were going to celebrate our wedding anniversary and they had a bottle in ice waiting in our room for us. The breakfast was really nice. All areas of the hotel are well decorated and easy to enjoy. I would highly recommend staying here.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well not sure where to begin. 25 th anniversary surprise set up by the blokes..After choosing 1882 as the stay over, bearing in mind there is a great deal of choice, I went for a Sa Grada view. Well “if its good enough for Gaudi its good enough for me”.The staff have been awesome they changed keys for us to allow the surprise to unfurl before the girls eyes, great at the bar and the door Anna gave us a recommend for Bar Mut- just don’t buy wine there The hotel foyer is welcoming with great looking seating - not the leather look that makes you look out of place when sat in it. Spend a couple of hours from 5pm on cheese wine order more drinks then hit the restaurant of your choice. Don’t forget to book if its special...Rooms are clean and functional beds are good guys but this hotel should be enjoyed on the roof in the pool lounging taking selfies looking across Famillia Barca. Then later downstairs in the bar area. Breakfast is a great set up with all that you could want in choice. It will get you to the first cafe stop of the day..I’m staying again when in Barca see you then 1882...
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff is friendly and helpful. We had an incident with the bartender ( who doesn't work there anymore) and The manager was quick to remedy. Be sure to book with the morning breakfast buffet. Once afternoon we ordered the assortment of croquettes, grilled octopus with candied potato and the Iberian ham with bread and tomato with Cava and beer. The food is very good and all is reasonably priced. Go to the top floor deck for the great views, there is a pool, we didn't use as it was cold. The bar will run up drinks to you if you ask. There is a free walking tour- don't miss this & the gentlemen was wonderful. The hotel lobby and bar area is relaxing and cozy, we stopped here each evening just to sit with the house vermouth before heading to bed. Our room was also cozy ( we did take the peanut dish to use for the soap dish and took face clothes from another hotel bath room as these are not available) shhh..... don't tell.. The towels and product are nice, I rented a robe for 10 for the week and was worth it. My husband and I didn't have an issue with the bathroom as others have indicated in their reviews. The bed was comfortable and we slept well each night, having an inside room ( which didn't have any views) we were okay with that. Cheers to the staff who were very helpful - getting us directions and making suggestions to where to go. We had a fabulous experience at this hotel and would book there again. Please share the hotel scent- seriously this place smells so GOOD!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Freshly renovated, clean and comfortable hotel with a very friendly staff.Extra points I'll be giving for an amazing location - 5 minutes proximity to Sagrada Familia, a perfect summer terrace with a view and delicious breakfasts.Thank you, I enjoyed my stay in your hotel a lot!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An amazing location 2 blocks away from the Sagrada Familia. A very attentive staff and high quality service. We have enjoyed a wonderful time and will come back soon. The terrace and the swiming pool on the roof are magnificent. One word : perfect !
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel for its proximity to the wonderful Sagrada Familia and we were very happy to say that this hotel definitely exceeded our expectations! This was one of the best places we have ever stayed on our frequent European travels, in all facets of room, staff, breakfast and location. Cannot recommend this place highly enough and the location is absolutely perfect.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A relatively new hotel. Breakfast is good at reasonable price though there are many choices too just outside the hotel in 2 to 3 minutes walking distance. Hotel provide happy hour drink at 17:00pm everyday for 30 mins.Walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. If anything not perfect, here are the ones - No robe no slipper in room. Very poor sound proof, we can clearly hear our next door snored.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A great spot with view to Sagrada Família.Clean and smells good.Caretaker and nice employees. We like the food and the space.Excellent and wonderful breakfast.It was a couple trip and we really like it the hotel and recommend it.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good hotel, perfect location, lovely atmosphere, helpful staff, great breakfast, free cycles if you want them, umbrellas when it rains, staff can't do enough for you! Room was good, bed really comfortable
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful hotel, everything you want and need and very quiet rooms which we were pleasantly surprised about! Would definitely recommend and return on my next trip to barcelona - really pleased overall!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The 1882 is a really special place to stay. Everything was perfect. I appreciate the guided walk, the design, the pool. Breakfast is just great. I recommend the hotel to any kind of traveller, friends, couple, family.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is only two blocks from the Segrada Familia and within walking distance to many other sites. The rooms are nice and very clean, the bar, restaurant and sitting areas are lovely, the food and wine quite good, and the staff is absolutely amazing! Each person we interacted with was professional, extremely helpful and very friendly. Special thank you to Mirela who provided several fantastic recommendations, as well as the front desk staff who located cabs, provided directions, recommendations, etc.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here this week for my Fiancé’s 30th birthday and what a perfect stay it was! We arrived at the hotel at around 11am, we were aware that check in wasn’t until 2pm so to our surprise a room was ready for us to check in early which was fab! Every part of the hotel decor is stunning, even down to the beautiful smell. The rooms are beautiful and spacious. We spent our first day at the beautiful rooftop terrace pool which has a stunning view of the Sagrada Família. When we went back to our room, they had delivered us a complimentary bottle of fizz for my Fiancé’s 30th birthday which was a lovely touch! All of the staff are so helpful and friendly, they gave us any information we needed about the city. Breakfast was Amazing, the omelettes are to die for. Thank you for making our stay so perfect, we can’t wait to come again!☺️
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful, well presented hotel with extremely helpful staff! Stayed with my friends at the beginning of April and it was just amazing. Its very central and close to loads of restaurants/ bars/ tourist attractions and there are two metro stations within 5-7mins walking distance. The room itself was gorgeous! Very high quality. The same goes for the hotel as a whole - everything about this hotel is 1st class. Will definitely recommend to friends and family and will 100% stay here again on my next trip to Barcelona.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in Hotel Barcelona 1882 in April 2019 just before catching our cruise in Barcelona. The hotel is clean and staff are friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast there. A little pricey but it’s worth the money. Convenient location. A short walking distance to the famous the Sagrada Familia and close to the metro! We will stay there again next time we go to Barcelona!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is fantastic. In the center of Barcelone slightly away from the heart of the town. The decor is plantation. Super quality. Great rooms. Fantastic staff. Comfortable rooms. Its my new place in Barcelona. I will be back.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cannot fault this hotel - amazing location, staff and views. Cleanliness of the hotel is spot on, non expensive bar and friendly staff. Thank you for a fab stay. Definitely take a trip to the roof top, it is totally worth it bit it isn't staffed so get your drinks downstairs first.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay in Barcelona was an adulthood gift for my doughter and this hotel was great choice: modern, chic, just few steps from Sagrada Família (dont miss the hotel selfie point on 7th floor) and even other turistic points in walking distance (Park Guell 30min, Placa Catalunya 20min...). Hotel offers really great breakfast bufet and nearby there are many good places to eat and have a drink. During our stay the weather was not enough warm, still we really enjoyed the roof terrace with the pool - really relaxing place! The hotel staff is helpfull - ready to book/order for you hop-on-hop-off bus or entrance tickets, print your boarding pass, provide you with the city map ... Cherry on the top was guided walk around Sagrada Familia (Saturdays 18:00 free of charge).
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel, we were welcomed by the warm staff and glass of Cava. It was our first visit to Barcelona and we both loved the location with the Sagrada Familia just around the corner, it was a good walk to the port and the gothic quarter which enjoys being able to take all the other sights in whilst walking around the city. Also some very nice places to eat in the hotel area, some are basic but do the best tapas and are enjoyed by the locals. Would defiantly stay again and recommended to other people.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the WORST experience I’ve had at a hotel. I will never ever stay at this hotel AGAIN. My sister and I walked into the hotel after hours of flying. We are two small girls and we had multiple bags with us. We were struggling to carry our bags to get into the hotel. The men at the front desk saw us visibly struggling to carry our bags and not one of them tried to help us.Once we checked in I asked if there was someone that could help us with our bags. The man at the front desk stated that “there was no one to help us with our bags” but I saw multiple people that worked at the hotel lounging around... the hotel also messed up our room. We requested two beds but they assigned us with a room with one bed.. and stated that the hotel was fully booked for the night.. I also had an issue when I was checking out. They stated that they would be charging my card 18 euros for “national calls” that I made. The only calls that I made was locally and that was to call the tourist office for an excursion I booked. The man at the front desk was very rude and I overall had an HORRIBLE experience at this hotel. I recommend anyone that is considering to stay at this hotel to find somewhere else. There are MUCH nicer hotels in Barcelona that actually have great hospitality. I repeat STAY AWAY FROM THIS HOTEL. They have the worst hospitality and the people at the front desk have the nastiest attitudes. This hotel is money hungry and will try to charge you for everything!Stay away from this place and use your money towards a nicer and classier hotel. Because this hotel AINT IT!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely incredible hotel. Everything about it was excellent. The lobby is stunning, the rooms are so stylish, there is an amazing roof top pool with the best views. I would love to stay here again.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easter break!! Fantastic 5 day trip, lots to see and do. Excellent location and good service. Could have wider choice of for bar. Offered Gaudí walking tour- interesting, shame it rained!! Excellent location and service.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were very happy with this choice of hotel for our stay in Barcelona. The rooms are really spacious and well set out and the hotel itself is only 2mins walk from Sagrada Família. The view from the hotel rooftop is a little disappointing but other than that the public areas of the hotel are also clean and comfy. Cooked breakfast could be improved for the price but there were lots of other choices (cereal, pastries etc) and the hotel did well catering for all dietary needs. If you prefer something similar and cheaper there are a few good sit-in bakeries nearby. The bar was cheap for drinks, and the bedrooms again comfy and quiet allowing for a decent nights sleep after miles of walking. Overall I would have no problem recommending this hotel.
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very goog location, quiet at night and near Sagrada Familia and Metro station, a variety of good Restaurants nearby. Nice room, good service even the bikes for free were in a good condition.Thank you for our good sleep :-)
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Barcelona 1882 is situated approximately a 5 minute walk from Sagrada Familia (which is viewable from its incredible terrace). My friend and I stayed for 4 nights over my birthday. The staff were wonderfully helpful and gave us recommendations for restaurants to visit, and they even left a bottle of cava and a birthday card in our room, which really was the cherry on top of a fantastic stay - incredible customer service. The hotel was decorated beautifully which meant wonderful photos, not only around Barcelona, but also at the hotel to remember this trip by. Couldn't recommend the hotel more!
hotelName:
2    Hotel Barcelona 1882
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the minute you walk in the door you feel welcome. The graceful staff greets you immediately and with a smile all attention to details. From the hotel host/manager to the bell staff the feeling you get is it's about your satisfaction. The marble columns and stairway with a baby grand piano in the hotel lobby create a graceful ambiance and the artwork in the studios is exceptional. we stayed three nights after flying into BCN and never needed or wanted anything that wasn't handled with great dignity and care and concern. The place is SPOTLESS, literally as clean as a new hotel, however this location has been here for awhile. The breakfasts were very good, as was the food and presentation. I would recommend this to all of my friends and their spouses for a reasonable fare. Check out their web site for some cool "options"
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all thanks to ,indulge football breaks,for the advice of where to stay in Barcelona,What a truly amazing city so much to do so much to see.The city just oozes class.stayed at he Astoria hotel only a 3star that's selling it a bit short first class staff were there when needed.Yes the roof pool is small but just for a couple of relaxing hours no problem.went with a group of 10 all enjoyed.Would I go back like a flash I advise anyone who's never been do it.If possible stay near the gothic centre that way your near to the beach so you can enjoy city and beach without taxis.And about restaurants there's so many good ones you'd be really unfortunate to pick a bad one .
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Astoria in Barcelona is located in the great and safe neighborhood and its buildings is beautiful. The service is wonderful and staff is very helpful. The room is clean and comfortable. We enjoyed staying this hotel.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Apart from few small things like; only 2 iron available in the entire hotel, periodic noise of water flowing in the bathroom pipelines, toiletries provided were limited (no toothpaste, brush), all other things were great. Very comfortable stay overall.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in Hotel Astoria for two nights, beautiful spacious room for Spain, close to the train station, a number of wonderful restaurants and easy and safe for walking. Hotel staff were amazing. Quiet. Breakfast started a bit late (8:00), but was good.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our stay at Astoria! Amazing location and super friendly staff. The breakfast was wonderful as well. I wish we would have had an iron and ironing board but that is just me being picky. The room was larger than most European rooms and the bathroom was nice too. I would highly recommend!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is well situated. It's comfortable - Inc the spare bed, which is often v lumpy in hotels. It's not far from excellent transport links and many restaurants. The pool is a welcome break from summer heat. It is quite small so you can't really swim far in it, but it has great rooftop views and is perfectly presented and enough loungers / deck chairs to sit out enjoying the sun. Bar and food service by the pool too in case of need.Staff are helpful and friendly. Didn't try the food as it was too pricey. But Audrey's cafe is nearby which is good for breakfast /Brunch /lunch (it's only 2 blocks down and 1 across). Plus plenty of local restaurants nearby. But do check on Google and trip adviser and their websites in case they are shut on particular nights (usually Sundays and Mondays) or don't open til 7.30/8pm. Some stay open more. But best to check before setting out.Really enjoyed our stay in this luxurious hotel. Comfy, clean, great staff. Apart from price of hotel food I cannot fault it at all. Thank you for helping us have a fantastic holiday.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found the Astoria hotel staff very helpful for our short stay in Barcelona! This hotel is in a good location close to bus routes and quiet for a rest after busy days sightseeing: The room was clean and comfortable and the pool was refreshing on some hot evenings. We would stay. Here again on another visit.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed or stay at hotel Astoria very much. The hotel has a stylish interior, rooms were comfortable and clean. The breakfast was varied and good. Very friendly and helpful staff. the hotel is situated very near interesting sights and shopping areas. Lots of restaurants and terraces near it. Definitely a great place to stay during your visit in Barcelona.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. Just returned from a 4 day break. Excellent location easy to get metro or bus to all the places of interest. Hotel is impeccably clean and comfortable. Spacious rooms, very comfortable beds, lovely en suite. Great choice for breakfast , buffet style and option of hot food cooked to your order. Sun terrace and pool was fabulous after a hot day sightseeing, couldn’t get my daughter out of it ! But the highest recommendation must go to the fantastic staff, so friendly (reception has someone there 24 hours). They could not have been more helpful -maps and brilliant advise re bus metro routes and stops, nothing was too much trouble. The manager chatted to us at breakfast and was asking if we were happy with everything. Would not consider going to another hotel if I return to Barcelona- BRILLIANT.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have just returned from a short break at this hotel. All I can say is.... WOW!! Such a beautiful hotel from the moment you walk in. All staff were very friendly and approachable and couldn’t do enough to help you. Room was very clean and towels etc were replenished daily which I loved. In such a great location with lots to do around. The roof top pool was beautiful with a great view! Thank you so much for a great visit. We will definitely be back!!!!!!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My daughter and I stayed at Hotel Astoria for a mother-daughter trip to Barcelona and loved it! It is an adorable, small, clean, lovely hotel centrally located just outside of the crowded touristy area but within walking distance to everything and the Metro station too! There is a beautiful little plaza right next door with great restaurants, a pharmacy and coffee shops. Be sure to check out Brunch and Cake! LOVE!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had the most amazing stay at the Astoria. We arrived late due to a delayed flight but the staff were so welcoming, in particular Domingo who was amazing. He assisted us with things to do and had excellent recommendations for places to eat and party. All the team were fantastic, if you're visiting barcelona make sure you stay here, location is great and the hoteliers are even better.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Small room but good enough for a one night stay. Good central location and it has a roof terrace and small pool. Friendly staff and overall nice hotel. It's a derby hotel and they have a good chain of hotels in Barcelona.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was wonderful to stay in the true native area of Barcelona to experience the real Barcelona culture, food, and the style was a great experience. Staff was very friendly and very accommodating. Highly recommend.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location was perfect. Only took a minutes to reach Diagonal Station. There are many Restorant and convenience market near the hotel.If you strong enough you can go to Sagrada Familia by walking. Its about 2.5 Km.I have done it and its worthed. I can see the beauty of Barcelona city during my walk. For safety, better provide yourself with the internet connection for road guideline. Its very comfortbale to walking around Barcelona. And during my stay, i never met bad people.Do you love liquoer? Its easy to find with cheap price. I bought 1 bottle oa sampanye and it only 1 Euro. Taste good. You can find itu at conveniece market (supermercat) near Astoria.Palea? Its one of food you have to eat.Iberico Ham and their seafood.It taste heaven.Souvenir?if you need to buy, you can find it around Sagrada. Various souvenir including magnet, keyholder, Barca thing ... and Gaudi Lizard. If you are lucky, you can but 6 for 5 Euro.Dont forget Barca merchandise. You can get cheaper price there than at Camp Nou. Of course the quality is different but its still worthed.TURRON is one of souvenir to bring. I find it near Sagrada but i dont have time to buy it. Closed at 9 pm. Too bad.Burger? there are plenty of burger there but FIVE GUYS is my choice. Taste and Price.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is really a hidden gem. Reasonably priced for a weekend away. I went for a long weekend with my mother to celebrate her birthday. The building is in keeping with the Barcelona architecture and the inside is the same. Very friendly staff and checking in and out was very easy. The rooms are spotless with big fluffy towels and slippers for your comfort, mini bar is fully stocked everyday. Items like cola is quite expensive from the mini bar but the alcohol for a 50ml miniature is 5 euros. Which I find good. The room was cleaned daily by a lovely housekeeper, I only saw her in passing. We would pop out for an hour and come back to a clean room. The rooftop pool is bliss. They provide towels for the pool so you do not need to pack your own if you plan on using. There is only 6 sunbeds, 3 on each side with 4 beach chairs and 2 dining chairs. They could do with more sunbeds but if it wasn't for the 36⁰ weather that we had while there we may have not used the pool and the 6 sunbeds they had would normally be enough. I have trouble walking and use a stick for walking long distances and up and down stairs. Did not need to use my aid in this hotel as it is all serviced by lifts (apart from the communal toilets - which we only used on check out while waiting for transfer) the hotel is very central to 'Diagonal' metro station (5 min walk) and all the buses. There is a mini supermarket and tabaconist on the same road as the hotel so you never have to go to far. Overall a really good stay and perfect for a Barcelona city break!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located in a nice area. Thre is a walk of 3 long blocks to the Metro. Good restaurants are nearby. The hotel breakfast is a bit pricey but there are bars and cafes very near where you can get a good breakfast for less. You can walk to some of the finest Gaudi houses as well as to other modernist buildings.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, staff are friendly and very helpful and extremely nice rooms. Metro is about a 5 minute walk from the hotel booked hop on hop off bus from hotel reception and reception taught me to use metro ticketing machines.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great stay at Hotel Astoria. The staff were lovely and helpful, excellent location, comfy beds and good sized bathroom with all the amenities. I would highly recommend a stay here for those wanting a nice getaway where you can see and do everything but not in the center of the touristy area
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Astoria for 3 nights. We checked in early our room wasn’t ready but we left our bags and were told to come back around 14:00. The hotel is in a fairly central location around a 15-20 min walk to la Ramblas. The metro Diagonel is just around the corner with links to all parts of town a single trip costing €2. We got a taxi to and from the airport costing €25 each time but it would be just as easy to use the public transport if you didn’t have to much luggage. The staff at the hotel were friendly and helpful. The hotel was clean. The only downside we found was our room was number 322 which is opposite the lifts and right next door to the cleaners storage cupboards. We were woken every morning by a lot of banging and noise being made by the cleaners who maybe need to keep the noise down early in the mornings! Also our mini fridge in the room leaked every time we came back from a day out the fridge had leaked water on the floor. I asked to use an iron which reception provided but didn’t provide an ironing board ? So I had to iron on the floor on a towel!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good service, room is very clean and nice, comfortable bed, good location for bus and metro, plenty of restaurants and shops around, friendly and courteous staff, often saw the manager greeting us and checking if everything was fine, The view from the rooftop was lovely . I was very happy.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were awestruck by the timeless elegance and classic chic .The amazing art gallery of local work from the early 1900's wanders throughout the main floor. This hotel is a piece of artwork itself. The friendly and efficient staff spoiled us, but did not hover over us. The view of spectacular and architecturally varied courtyards and balconies behind us a looked like a destination in itself. I was impressed by the cleanliness of the room, halls,floor to ceiling marble foyer, elegant staircases and everything.Amazing rooftop pool and lounge area with a breathtaking view. The bed was luxurious with a heavenly duvet and copious pillows. The updated rooms included contemporary cabinetry with closet doors holding drawers and choice of slippers and on the other side of the room a credenza with a well stocked bar fridge .Close to taxis, restaurants and shops . Photos to follow.....
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel room was very clean. Amenities were bountiful. Bar was lacking on rooftop, but the view was lovely. We didn't receive the perks of the room we purchased until we inquired about them. Hotel was located in a very ideal location and in walking distance of hip areas. If you're looking to be close to the tourist trap of las ramblas this isn't the place for you.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When my husband and I travel, we normally stay at 4 or 5 star hotels. But after reading a number of reviews about this hotel, we decided to try it. My expectations were exceeded. It's a very clean, updated hotel situated in the city center. On my first day there, I took a walk around the block and found at least 15+ eateries (restaurants, cafes, tapas bars, bakeries, patisseries). Additionally, there's a mini market just down the corner. This location is walkable to Casa Mila, Casa Battlo, a street that is compared to the Champs Elysees in Paris called Passeig de Gracias lined with high end stores. We bought a bus card (10 euros for 10 rides) at the tobacco shop steps away from the hotel. Very easy to get around by bus. The hotel desk staff was very helpful as they have tickets available which we purchased for a flamenco show, Casa Mila, Casa Battlo and Park Guell (among others). They also work with an travel company if you would like to book an excursion as well. The only little downside is I wish they had complimentary bottles of water in the room. We did take one from the mini fridge (which was 2.5 euros), then headed to the nearby mini market to stock up on water. Also, breakfast at the hotel was 16.5 euros which I thought was very expensive especially since there are so many breakfast options nearby. All in all, I would highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Astoria was picked out for us by our travel agent, and we were so happy with our stay. We arrived at noon on a cold, rainy day. My husband was battling the flu and felt terrible. The helpful staff quickly got us a quiet, interior room and carried our bags up for us. The metal shutters on the window allowed us to block out all light, so he could sleep during the day.I loved the neighborhood around the hotel: easy walking distance to La Pedrera and the Diagonal subway stop, and a 25 min walk to Sants train station and to Placa de Catalunya. We ended up having the breakfast buffet every day at the hotel (discounted rate of 11 euros), because it was convenient, quality and we could make healthy choices. We also ordered room service twice, since my husband was ill and we didn't want to wait until 8 pm when many of the nearby restaurants opened for dinner. Staff promptly brought our tasty food and then took away our dishes.When you get sick on vacation, it's so wonderful to be able to rest in a quality, well-appointed hotel with attentive staff who speak excellent English (and a lot of other languages, too).
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First off, my sincere thanks to Luis for making my stay extremely comfortable, and for helping me with checking up on things (either with a map or on the internet) that I wanted to include in my itinerary during my stay in Barcelona. Also, since I did not have a kettle for hot water in my room, Luis organised this immediately for the duration of my stay. In addition, when I had a problem with the noise from the terrace (I was in Room 826), and couldn't sleep the entire night of Saturday due to the noise, Luis and Domingo assured me that there wouldn't be any noise the next night, and if there was, to definitely call Reception, who would attend to it. Domingo was also very helpful and friendly. My interaction with Luis and Domingo is what made a difference to my stay at Astoria. During the day time shift, the front desk was busy, and not really interested in attending to me at all. Everybody else that I saw at Reception really didn't care to engage with me as a guest at the hotel. I'm not sure whether this has to do with my being non-white/Caucasian, or whether it was generally the attitude. I do not know whether I would visit Astoria again solely because of this reason.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 6 nights with my wife on vacation in April '19. Firstly, the room looks NOTHING like the picture here on Tripadvisor. I was shocked to see the tiny space which was supposed to be my "Superior" room. Barely any space to move around. Tried explaining this to the Hotel staff, but they didn't bother to help, or even hear me out properly. Breakfast at the hotel was too expensive for my taste - 16.50 euros per person per day. We stepped out to cafes at walking distance and spent half that amount for a better breakfast. All in all, a very AVERAGE stay. Not recommended.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff is kind and gracious. Rooms well appointed. The bar staff were exceedingly friendly and efficient. Good neighborhood as well . My only wish would be a kettle in the room but this is not the norm in spain
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I travel a lot and this may be the all-around nicest hotel we have stayed in. It may not have 5 star services but the decor, the artwork, the jewel of a simple restaurant, the helpfulness and warmth of the staff, the comfortable rooms and the location in the Example district close to the center but quieter make an almost unbeatable combination. From now on, this is where we will stay in Barcelona.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, the staff is very helpful. The hotel has beautiful and clean rooms. The breakfast is very good and fresh. You can easy get to Diagonal metro station and to placa Catalunya. You can also walk to Casa Batlo, or take the touristic bus. The hotel has a pool on the terrace, which is full with cold water, so if you are not there in the summer , you cannot use it. And if you are there in the summer, the pool is too small for the entire hotel.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just Loved our stay here. Very helpfull and friendly Staff. Check in and out worked perfect. It was our wedding aniversary and hotel arranged a Perfect surprice. Would really recomend this to everyone. In walking distance to shopping and only 30 minutes walk to Beach
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited Barcelona for a weekend recently and stayed at the Hotel Astoria. It is well located just a few minutes walk from the main streets, the open top bus tours pass nearby and there and some nice restaurants in the local area. The staff were friendly, the hotel very clean and quite impressive as you walk into the lobby and the breakfast selection was good.The big issue with it however is that it is an older building that has never been thoroughly modernised to be a hotel, so the doors on rooms and the windows to the streets outside are not well sound proofed. So when people arrive later at night you hear every one in the hallways outside your room. A number of the rooms near the top of the hotel also have loud air conditioning units or lift machinery adjacent, which would be very difficult for the average person to sleep through.I would probably give the hotel a poor rating based on this, other than the fact that there really are not that many modern hotels in the centre of Barcelona and at the price of the Astoria. So if you're an easy sleeper or just in Barcelona for a night or two it's actually an OK choice.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean, reasonable price, and comfortable hotel with friendly staff. It is located in a good area with many restaurants, cafe, and convenient stores. It is about a 10 minute walk from the metro station so it is not as convenient if you carry large luggage or after a long day of sightseeing.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Although not centrally located the hotel is close enough to the city centre with a variety of shops, bars and restaurants to suit every requirement for couples or families. sited in a quiet area and surrounded by delightful architecture
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In a really good area for eating out and getting out and about.The staff were really friendly and the front desk recommended a really nice tapas restaurant for the 1st night.Our room was of a good size and the bed was really comfortable. The only downside was the small bathroom and getting out of the shower was virtually impossible due to the bidet being so close to the bath. Breakfast was nice and there was plenty of it. They did a freshly cooked breakfast if you wanted. The best bit was the gorgeous terrace at the top of the hotel with a plunge pool and a distant view of the Sagrada familia. It caught the evening sun rays.It took about 25 minutes to walk to plaza catalunya and the Ramblas - so a great location.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I will recommend this hotel to my friends if any of them will visit Barcelona, because the location is very good, also the hotel is very stylish, the terrace on 8th floor is nice and all around very suprising quality of services and food and drinks in restaurant/bar
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, very good location for a visit in Barcelona. Clean room and bathroom. Service-level is very high. Breakfast is complete and fresh. When going back to Barcelona, this is the hotel for us to stay.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Want a clean, beautiful, well located hotel in Barcelona! Hotel Astoria is the place to stay! Friendly staff, so accommodating and is walking distance to a lot of places!! I arrived early before check in and the accommodated me without any hesitation!!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is beautifully decorated, especially in the central areas. The staff were excellent during my stay, always on hand and very helpful.The rooms were clean and had everything required for a stay. If not a bit small, but as I was out and about most of the time, not an issue. The bed was comfortable and I slept well. My only gripe would be the air conditioning, I just couldn't get the room to the temperature that I required. But that was only a minor issue.All in all, the hotel is in a good location, clean and comfortable.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel location is very good! Very close to everything, excellent transportation, so many choices fe eating! They have bar and restaurant. Staff is very nice, and friendly! This hotel is classical style, but very clean, and Vell maintained.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for four nights with a friend while visiting my son in his semester abroad program. Outstanding staff. Went out of their way to be helpful. Very clean room and great towels. Great and clean hotel. Will return.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel, with a good shower and overall bathroom.They took good care of us. There was a good varity of food with breakfast. The room was clean and looked modern.Astoria is near the centre. So walking takes 20 min. to la Rambla. But there is in 10 min. a stop for the Hop on, Hop off bus. And also de Metro is nearby.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very clean. Comfortable bed. Big fluffy towels. Range of complimentary toiletries. Good selection for breakfast. Staff friendly and helpful. Would have liked tea/coffee facilities in room. A bit far out if you are walk
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First impressions of this lovely hotel were great. On arrival we were greeted by very friendly reception staff. Alvaro was extremely helpful and provided us with a map of the city and advice of where to go and what to see. During our stay Domingo on reception was also really helptful - thank you Our room was very nice and exceptionally clean, the bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever slept in. My only negative with the hotel was that they did not serve evening meal which was disappointing. The location was perfect as it was with walking distance of all the main areas of Barcelona. Although we didn't use the rooftop pool it was a lovely area and could imagine how nice it would be in the summer. We celebrated my birthday over the weekend of our stay and found a bottle of fizz on our return from our day out. This was a lovely touch - thank you very much. Would I go back? Definately! Thank you for a great stay.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spacious bedroom and confortable bed. Very clean bathroom and I liked the towels and the shower products. The place is really quiet and beautiful. Delicious and varieted breackfast. The recepcionists were very helpful and we can leave our bags in the hotel after check-out.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice an quiet small scale hotel, in a quiet neighbourhood, close to the centre. Shops and bars close by, but no noise hinderance. Well connected to public transport, but if you have time you can walk into the centre. Otherwise take the metro. Friendly people.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Astoria made our stay in Barcelona perfect! All the staff were friendly and helpful and the gentlemen on reception spoke excellent English. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Our room was spacious and well equipped and the en suite was lovely with a great shower! There was a reasonably priced minibar in the room and a safe.Everywhere in the hotel was spotlessly clean. Breakfast was the usual continental style with cold meats, cheeses and pastries etc and there was also the option for a cooked breakfast if you wish it. The restaurant was not open for dinner but there are lots of lovely bars and restaurants nearby so this was not a problem.We didn’t use the pool as our visit was in February but we spent some time by the pool as the roof is a real sun trap.The hotel houses an art exhibition which was really interesting.The location of the hotel is great, not far from La Pedrera. There was a metro station nearby but we chose to walk everywhere. We were so impressed with The Astoria and hope to return before too long!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located in the fashioned eixample district, surrounded by many great restaurants, this hotel good value for money . Clean rooms and great staff makes your stay enjoyable, and just a 15-20 minute walk from Plaça de Catalunya.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for a weekend in Astoria celebrating my Birthday. Absolutely perfect from the staff to the cleanliness, location all spot on. already thinking of coming back in May when the weathers a bit nicer
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for a weekend in this lovely hotel. The staff are friendly and super helpful. The hotel itself is clean and well kept. The art work displayed in various rooms/areas is very good and well worth viewing. Our room was cleaned both mornings and toiletries were replaced. The hotel is very close to Avinguda Diagonal for quality shopping and there are restaurants bars and cafes close by. Also some small supermarkets. I can recommend this hotel and I would stay there again.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Breakfast very good, sorry that not all are using the option to enjoy brekfast.. Other time of the day except evening not any need of the restaurang, close the doors. Be more open and proud of the extremt strong art presentation. Officiel time of the day some days in the week when Others can enter the rooms. A own Guide
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. It was in a great location not far from public transportation so it made getting to main sites easy (Sagrada Familia, Gaudi houses, etc.). It was extremely clean and quiet and the front desk was always helpful. I would highly recommend!
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I travel to Barcelona frequently on business. The staff is incredibly kind and efficient, and greet me as if I were family. Keys are ready to go and check-in is a breeze. Services, like printing PDF's from your room, is super fast and delivered with a smile. Love the oversize bath sheets in the bathroom--wow--they should sell these towels in the lobby. Slippers in the room are a plus. There are many pleasant restaurants in the neighborhood, including a few of my favorites: Bardot, Filete Ruso, Paco Meralgo. Best is the art: a lovely gallery of original Opisso drawings and sketches in the lobby, original posters from the 1900's in the restaurant, all in a modern setting.
hotelName:
3    Hotel Astoria
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My stay at the hotel was comfortable and I would write a good review if on the last day I had not been robbed right in the lobby of your hotel by two intruders. The workers at the reception did not provide any help, although there were video cameras right in front of them and they could at least see where the thief escaped. And it is not clear why in the evening there are strangers in the hotel when the restaurant is not working. All this suggests that the administration and thieves are in collusion. So thank you, we lost valuable things and ruined all the pleasant impressions of being in Barcelona.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 3 nights in this wonderful Hotel. The rooms are spacious with kitchenet and very good mattresses. Located between the Sacrada Familia and Ocean site. Nice and quiet. Very friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast okay. I would recommend this hotel and for sure return.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean, cosy and very well kept rooms. They have a decent play area for kids. Location of the hotel is good too. I liked the stay. This hotel could have been my defacto choice for future visits , if not for the petty restaurant service. It is a pity that I am not able to give 5 stars just because of this.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This been so far my worst experience in a hotel ever! Only good thing is location but not even that,there is so many hotels for the same price closer that this one. First of all internet didn't work,our room 212 had only one spot where you can sit and get wifi,girls at the frontdesk tried to help but only thing that they offerd us was change the room,but based on what i heard from other people in the hotel,there was no point. It doesn't even work at the front desk!!!!!!!!! If you want to wash your hair ,just a little head's up ther is not conditioner in the room,bc they don't put it in the room(words of a girl from a front desc)so they called housekeeping to bring it after almost 20 min waiting! This hotel doesn't deserve the stars that has ,im really disappointed and we will never stayed or recommend this to anyone! I put a picture of our wifi.... we have one more night and we are leaving this place from 1975.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were traveling as a family of four, two parents, one toddler, and his grandma. We stayed in this hotel for a week. Sergio in the front desk was friendly and accommodating. Rooms are very similar to the pictures, and provide a good night of sleep. However, we had a very disappointing situation with the breakfast service. The four of us went for breakfast, but my spouse and I ate very fast because we had to leave for a conference. Therefore, we grabbed a couple of small pastries for our toddler to eat later and gave then to his grandmother. Surprisingly, she was stoped in the elevator and forced by the waitress to put the small pastries back in the buffet! We have traveled the world, and this is the first time we encountered such a petty behavior. Also, I am not sure about the purpose of putting back food that was already touched by several people. It is an unhygienic practice that puts other guests at risk. For the record, we paid 10 euro each adult for the breakfast and 8 euro for our toddler, total 38 euros! Of course, this was our first and last time during our trip in Barcelona that we had breakfast at the hotel. By the way, there is a small locally owned restaurant that serves breakfast across the street of the hotel.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Checked in this hotel - Capri Fraser Barcelona - today 7th August 2019. Air conditioning in room does not works. Faucets are broken. How can a hotel clear a room for guest occupancy with such major defects. Very slow response. Not great at all
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can’t rate this hotel highly enough. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious, with quirky artistic designs. It was very welcome to have kitchen facilities, including a fridge to keep water cool for the next day’s travels. The beds were so comfortable; I don’t think I’ve slept so well for a long time. Very handy to walk to the beach and also on a tube line to get quickly to the city centre. We didn’t try the hotel restaurant or bar as there was a great bar just round the corner that did a really good deal on pastries and coffee for breakfast. I would definitely recommend this hotel and will be returning here myself in the future
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent, spacy room, clean, nice bathroom, modern like all hotel. Free, secure parking, nice balcony for chill, great staff. Great gym too. Quiet neighborhood. 20 minutes to Barceloneta and Nova Icaria beaches. About 25-35 minutes from Gothic quarter and La Rambla, 12-15 minutes to Arc de Triomf...Excellent hotel.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a great and comfortable stay. The front desk were friendly. The room was spacious, clean and well decorated. They have free laundry and provides washing detergents. The location is good too with metro station about 8 minutes walk away.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, our stay was great. Quiet street, easy to catch the bus or metro. Several small shops to buy food nearby. The hotel even offers free use of washing machines for guests. Front desk staff was always friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When somebody travel, first impression is decisive to come back. For sure this place is not the place I will come back. No WI-Fi in all the rooms. Shower slippery. Buffet breakfast not the best and run out before time, hotel didn't keep breakfast till time it was supposed to be. Difficult to get Taxi if you go outside, every time we have to walk few blocks before. You can hear noise from street. Front desk not helpful if there is a problem in your room.
hotelName:
4    Capri by Fraser Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
