We didn't take dinner but right in front of the hotel there is a cool restaurant El Raco. The make delicious pasta and pizza, also yummy desserts with very reasonable prices.
hotelName:
13    Onix Rambla Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was a double, really nice and really spacious. The staff were amazing. Gave us loads of directions when necessary and very attentive. They constantly asked if we were okay and ensured our needs were met. There was never I time we needed someone and they were not there. We booked this hotel as part of an easyjet package but it exceeded all expectations. The view of the pool was nice and it was also nice to use. The rooms were cleaned thoroughly and very well. The room always looked nice. The breakfast was also very nice. Small room but never too busy. There was a good selection of dishes with loads of meats, bread and sweet things.
hotelName:
13    Onix Rambla Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In summary...amazing location, nice hotel but awful pool and even more awful breakfast! The location is ideal, right at the rambla. If you are going to see the city and the sites then it is ideal...slap bang in the middle with plenty of restaurants and bars around. However, don't go to this hotel for the pool...it is tiny...only feasible for a dip to cool down, not an actual swim and the area with sun loungers is also tiny.The rooms are modern and comfortable and the bathroom great. I would recommend NOT paying for breakfast.....it is tiny and the choice non existent. Even if you ate the entire buffet twice over you still wouldn't get your money's worth!!!
hotelName:
13    Onix Rambla Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located near the Sagrada Familia Cathedral in a quiet neighborhood. There was a supermarket less than one block away. The hotel staff was very friendly and eager to help you in whatever you needed. Great breakfast buffet.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was not worth the money! Not only is the room very small, we were two females in a foreign country and the man working at the desk for the hotel came to our room at 11pm to ask one of us out and ask for our number. This is so unprofessional and made us feel extremely unsafe for the rest of the our stay. Will never return here.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is perfectly clean, location is also very good because you are out of noise and city center drunk croud, but yet you are minutes off from Sagrada Familia, and your metro station is very near. Breakfeast is more than you can ask for, both quality and variaty. And the best thing about hotel is staff, extreamly exelent helpfull smily faces, so nice...
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here from 12-15 July on our first trip to Barcelona. Lovely wee hotel. Rooms were clean, spacious en-suite shower and toilet, room safe and mini fridge. A/C was a life saver on the warm nights, breakfast choices were plentiful and staff were all lovely. The location is perfect for exploring the city and within easy reach of Monumental Metro Station. Reception is 24-hr so always felt like help/information was available. Check-out was noon so plenty of time to enjoy breakfast and pack up before heading out. Would highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay was very pleasant, the twin room was small but very clean. Breakfast was a nice selection to start the day. The hotel is within walking distance or a short cab ride to major sites. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. We would absolutely book there again for a return trip
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really liked the hotel and it was very clean and very close to the Sagrada familia- only a couple of mins walk. Friendly and helpful staff and a good breakfast available. Room had a mini fridge which was useful as well but no coffee making facilities. Would recommend
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this hotel for three nights. The staff at the front desk was extremely helpful in all aspects of our stay and I thank,them . Our room was very clean and well appointed. The only two things missing for me were hair conditioner and face cloths. The breakfast was wonderful and had a great variety of fresh food. I would highly recommend this hotel for your stay in Barcelona.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff is very kind and always tasking care of your needs, the room was really very good and with no noise from outside. The area is maybe one of the best, the hotel is 3 minutes from central metro stations and some of the best monuments. The overall experience is very good, i would definately go again.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I resorted to earplugs to get to sleep. Far too noisy from both the street and other rooms. The hotel and room were clean but sometimes the cutlery at breakfast wasn't cleaned properly. There was not a great choice for breakfast. The scrambled egg was dry and cold. On the 3rd day I asked for a boiled egg and was told "not possible". There was coffee making facilities in the room which I did make use of. If you want a good nights sleep I'm not recommending this hotel purely because of the noise.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 2 nights as a couple. The room was a nice size and everything was clean. It was extremely quiet the whole stay. The breakfast had a pretty good selection with a wide variety of fruit, half canned, half fresh. Hotel staff was extremely nice and easy to check in and out. This is definitely 3 star hotel since the bathroom amenities are very limited (only soap, shampoo, and towels) but made up for it in cleanliness and quiet room with comfortable air conditioning. Exactly what we wanted for our short stay and highly recommended! The location is good but the metro station Monumental is not on a major line so transfers are required to get to most of the tourist spots. It would be nice if the hotel encouraged guests to smoke away from right outside the front door, but there is no smokiness other than the lobby.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel scored point with me because they provide a packed breakfast for travellers who have to check out early. Not much choices for breakfast but do-able so I am not complaining. Room is small but clean. Wish they provide room slippers. Location is within walking distance to the Sagrada Familia but catching the subway to Plaza Catalunya for shopping is not too difficult. However, if you are in Barcelona for shopping, perhaps better to say at the shopping belt.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Sant Antoni was perfect for my first visit to Barcelona. As a solo traveler, I avoid being in ‘touristy’ areas but want them close by. A short walk to the Metro or the bus stop and within 10 minutes I could be anywhere I wanted to be. The staff were most helpful ( thank you Ingrid and Cindy), enjoyed the breakfast options and my comfortable and cozy room (although space for your luggage and belongings may be challenging for two people). I asked for an outside facing room as natural light and fresh air are important to me and I was graciously accommodated. Many restaurants and markets within walking distance.If returning to Barcelona, I would definitely stay at Hotel Sant Antoni.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 3 nights while attending the Spanish Grand Prix. We found the hotel staff to be very pleasant, friendly and helpful. The room itself was very clean and well equipped. The hairdryer stopped working on the first night but reception staff replaced it instantly. Breakfast was average, fine for a short stay. Location is a little out the way. Overall happy with our stay and felt it was good value for money.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice room,and clean!Staff was helpfull and kind!Its a great hotel!When we go back someone,we choos the same hotel!The breakfast was good!The hotel is in a good location!Sagrada Familia is right “the next” corner!
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Surprisingly this hotel was the quietus of my stays in Girona, Port de Soller, and another in Barcelona. Comfortable beds and fast checking. The bonus was we could leave our bike boxes here for a small per day surcharge when going to Girona for six days. Of course we stayed here before and after Girona using the SantAntoni to bookend the Girona trip. Extremely professional, cordial and helpful staff. They made my days in Barcelona easy and I would use this hotel again without hesitation. If you need a large room these might seem small though I had no problems.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I cannot praise this hotel more highly enough. The day manager (a beautiful blond woman and I'm very sorry I couldn't find her name) was friendly and very accommodating towards cyclists, giving us her basement meeting room for assembling and disassembling bikes, as well as allowing us to store bike cases between our visits to Barcelona. (We stayed a total of 3 nights) Knowing we were cyclists, she always gave us the rooms on the quiet side of the hotel, and always accommodating us showing up way before our checkin time. The hotel showed great attention to all details. I cannot praise the professionalism and friendliness of the staff enough. Keep up the great work and we will recommend staying there to anyone who wants good night sleep in Barcelona.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel for 4 nights, the location is brilliant!Ten minutes walk from the Sagrada familia, 30 minutes for la Rambla, 15 minutes for la Barceloneta and 45 minutes for Parc Guell. If you don't fancy walking there are plenty of bus and tube near by. Breakfast is fresh and essential. The room are always spotless. The only down side is that you don't have any view from the hotel window and the room gets pretty hot after having showers as there is only one window in the bedroom. i would definitely recommend this hotel for a city break !!
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is very clean, the staff is extremely polite, the breakfast was good too. The only thing that I didn't liked is that walls are bit thin, and if you got the unfortunate chance of snoring neighbour, it will be an unpleasant experience.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed with my children over the weekend as apart of a trip to see Barcelona v Atletico Madrid at the Nou Camp. The triple room and bathroom were spotlessly clean. Breakfast was free and was great. The Front of House team were ever so helpful, friendly and professional. The location was a few minutes walk to the Metro. My tip is to walk out of the hotel and turn right. Walk down for about 25 minutes where you will get to the beach. Nice walk along the promenade as well as a plethora of eateries.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 3 nights in this lovely hotel. It's location is excellent for visiting La Sagrada Familia & for using the various tour buses etc.The staff were friendly and the rooms were clean and sufficient with an excellent shower.The breakfasts were fresh with a very wide choice of food Inc. Full English, continental, cereals and lots of fresh fruit. All self service, no limit to what you could eat, and proper toasters!,Highly recommended.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Main reason i chose the hotel was the location (close to company office, but also close to metro, sagrada familia, etc). Overall good value, rooms were pretty clean and comfortable (not too tight), so i’d recommend - esp. for business trip.If one thing can be improved, is the breakfast. Limited options and area a bit tight.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was wonderful, the room had new furniture and a big TV. The food was tasty, fresh and varied. The staff was friendly. Our room was cleaned every day. There are two metro stations near the hotel: Sagrada Familia, Monumental.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean and comfortable with a lovely breakfast - I will miss the Spanish omelette greatly. What more could one need? Would stay again, great value for money. My family were very pleased with my choice.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice and friendly persons,clean and comfortable rooms,very good breakfast! Fresh fruit,cheese and ham etc but no fresh orange juice,egs and bacon are also provided and very tastfullNext to sagrada familia and metro
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great value hotel in a perfect location, I've stayed with my boyfriend for 4 nights. Worth the money and good breakfast selection. Would definitively stay again. Little minus is the TV, tiny TV on massive wall
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I highly appreciate the services of this HOTEL.Breakfasts also very OK. Nice and friendly service. Room facilities efficient, clean and quiet.I recommend people who require peace and rest. Close to the center and communication.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a pleasure to visit Barcelone by staying at this hotel. Quiet and comfortable place, nice service, very friendly and helpful staff. It is well located and close to touristic needs. I recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I enjoyed my stay at Sant Antoni. As a tourist, I basically use a hotel just for sleep, so it was OK for me that Sant Antoni did not offer a multitude of amenities (e.g. pool, bars, etc.). I just needed a bed to sleep on. I appreciate that the bathroom was a standard size vs those tiny bathrooms at other european hotels. My stay included breakfast, which had a variety of options. The staff too was very nice and friendly. The only negatives: my room view was indoor (but I wasn't in the room much so didn't care) and there weren't any electrical outlets near the bed.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Hotel Antoni, within walking distance of the Sagrada Familia. The area was actually quiet, but nice restaurants, bars, subway and bus lines, etc. all in walking distance.The room was spotless although small. We only slept in it though! There's plenty to do outside. Breakfast was much nicer than we expected - very European with a nice selection of fruits, meats, dairy and grains. Coffee was excellent. The staff was also very accommodating. It looks so small, but everything is really there, just quite efficient. We would stay there again as it was a very good value too.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is really a very, very good deal if one of your main 'must see' places is the Sagrada Familia cathedral. The price we paid for a day's stay is just the equivalent of the taxi ride from the airport to the hotel (there was heavy traffic & the ride took an hour ++). In Barcelona, taxi rides are almost the same or even cheaper than ride-sharing schemes like Cabify or Uber. The Airport/local bus & local MRT are cheap but you have to drag your baggage around while looking for those small street signs & house numbers.This small but well-lit -with a signage- hotel is nestled in a corner & the Sagrada cathedral is just a 10-15 minute walk. As soon as you step out of the hotel door, just head north (don't turn left (west) nor right (east) --just cross the street & head north) & make sure you cross the wide Avinguda Diagonal (Diagonal Avenue in English) & you're almost there. If you're a fast walker, you can do SF in 10 minutes!But what makes this hotel such a bargain was the breakfast that would cost you easily a lot of Euros outside. They have literally everything you could ask for to nourish you for an entire day: a big, fast coffee machine, fruits, cereals, a good sampling of cold cuts (no Jamon Iberico, though), fruits, olives, cheeses, scrambled/boiled eggs & more plus, yes -- good Spanish sardines!!! Where you eat breakfast doubles up as a cafe later in the day.The rooms are rather small with very narrow hallways but clean and decent but the shower stall have very good water pressure. As typical in a small European hotel, a 'double bed' consisted of 2 narrow beds pushed together. Since you'll stay more time outside, I'm not complaining. We had paid much higher prices in other places with no breakfast at that.The room we had was at the back & had a view of life's reality in a big tourist-centric city where apartments/condos were converted into small hotels/hostels to make money. If you happen to have a room in the front, there's really nothing much to see except the narrow street action below.Would I recommend it or, shall I stay here again?? Again, if you plan to visit Sagrada Familia & would like a very, very leisurely walk going there, this is your place. Take a taxi if plan to go the La Boqueria/Plaza Catalunya/Las Ramblas & all that madness in Barcelona.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were in the hotel fromDEC1 to DEC4.The hotel and the room was very clear.The staff was also very helpful.The breakfast was very good,and you could choose from several meals.4 stars just for two reasons:first:there was missing a door from the shower court,which was very big and comfortable on the other hand.second:it was a little bit noisy when the neighbors were using the shower or the toilette,near or above us.Anyways,it was a very nice hotel,and i recommend it for everyone who are not in a 5star need!:))
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a lovely time. Nice staff, nice room cosy but would not expect bigger in a city. Great breakfast choices. Nice staff. Only downside was the cleaning detergent smelled very strong. But with opening the windows for a little bit it was fine.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was shocked how amazing this little hotel was. Very clean and modern in design. In addition the breakfast was very delicious and the location of the hotel easy access to everything. I am very happy I chose this hotel and would definitely book again.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: wonderful, economic hotel, clean and the help is greatfriendly service desk and Cindy and Ingrid are superbour room was impeccable, and the breakfast was almost like a lunch more than a breakfastI will be back in September 2018
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location for the Sagrada and Gaudi's famous houses are also within walking distance (30mins). We used the Metro a fair bit whilst in Barcelona, so being close the a Metro stop was also practical. Very friendly staff too.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our first time in Barcelona with no regrets with our choice of accommodation. Checked in by Nelson on reception who was very helpful. Our room was modern, very clean and welcoming. Breakfast was great - a choice of hot and cold, cereal, fruit, yogurts, bread, cakes, tea, coffee, juice etc, perfect start to the day.With a 6 min walk to Sagrada Familia or 2 mins to Monumental metro stations - perfect.Also a supermarket virtually next door.Thank you to all the staff for a great 4 night stay.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect place to visit all the attractions due to her perfect location close to the metrostations. Friendly hotel. Smal but clean room. Good beds. Good breakfast, only the coffee machine should be replaced.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved everything about this hotel. The price was affordable, staff was friendly and helpful, room was clean and comfortable, the free breakfast was very good, and free WiFi. I’d highly recommend. Barcelona is one of my new favorite cities and we would stay there again.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Small quiet and basic hotel, situated 35 - 40 minutes walking distance from Las Ramblas and Placa De Catalunya, but only 7 mins walk from Sagrada Familia. Breakfast was plentiful with all the usual fruits, cereals, pastries, cold meats etc, the only downside was the coffee (auto machine) and orange not exactly the best (orange was that powder stuff) but hey, it's 3 star not 5 and you get what you pay for. Hotel was extremely clean, bed soooo comfy (think mattress was memory foam) and very quiet which, after a day of treading the pavements of Barcelona was a blessing. Staff were helpful and always friendly. Nearest metro is Monument (L2 purple line), but please be aware, pickpockets tried to get into my husbands rucksack on the escalator, there was 3 of them, 2 men and 1 woman, who stopped the escalator (i guess to distract and confuse) and on walking up they opened his rucksack, thankfully didn't take anything as he felt something, turned round and foiled them. Please be really careful and take precautions. Other than that we loved Barcelona, also check price of taxi to airport before leaving as we paid 22 euros on arrival and 49 when leaving..........hmmmm.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very close to Sagrada Familia and its metro and also very close to another metro ...Monumental. We even managed to go to the airport by metro by using the L5 and the L9. It's very easy. Very clean hotel with very sufficient breakfast , hot and cold and alot of sweet pastries to chose from. Friendly and helpful staff. In my opinion some missing things in the room are some shelving in the bathroom so to put the personal toileteries and a better size desk instead of a very small table, although the room doesn't permit much . A bit small for three people.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is close to the Sagrada Familia and has two subway stations. Also almost opposite they have a delicious Argentinian restaurant.It is already the second time we are in this hotel and it seemed very good.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found the Hotel welcoming and comfortable and an excellent location for visiting the various attractions of Barcelona. Very convenient to Metro and Train stations. Breakfast was very well presented offering a wide choice for all tasted.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location- 5 minutes walk to Sagrada Familia.European breakfast - lot of fruits and vegetables.Very clean room and bathroom.Helpful stuff.In room small fridge, safe, ironing board.In bathroom hairdryer and small bottles of shower gel and shampoo.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the only thing that this hotel has is its location when we made the call, they gave us a call because they doubled on the card by mistake and blocked me almost all my money for 15 days until it was clear from the banks, of course I was not compensated for the fact that without money those days just asked me Sorry.many problems with the room especially our last night that spoiled the air conditioner and we could not sleep from the heatif you have the chance to close somewhere else
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel had a great location! Just walking distance to Sagrada Familia. Ended up taking the Hop on Hop Off city tour, which also happens to have a stop in front of Sagrada, to make our way round Barcelona! Downtown is easily accessible by train from the hotel.The hotel was nice and clean, with all the basic necessities anyone needs. Rooms are small compared to what we are used but with modern furnishings making it comfortable. We had an issue with the air condition not working properly but was quickly resolved by the front desk when brought to their attention. Great breakfast buffet!Reception staff were polite and friendly.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the first time myself and my family stayed at this hotel.The hotel staff made you feel welcome .They could not do enough for you Good location and breakfast. I would definitely stay there again.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the second time my son and I stayed at this hotel. We really like the service at this hotel. The rooms are clean. The staff is very friendly. The breakfast is good. The hotel also has an excellent location, its is very close to the Metro station.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice clean and little hotel. Close to purple metro line but also walking distance to centrum and also to beach. Breakfest included when making reservation from hotel website (also cheapest price comparing for example hotels.com).Very clean hotel, everything you need is included (breakfest, safe, AC etc) but quite small rooms.I would recommend this hotel if you dont want to be in middle of Rambla. And you would prefer stay here than Rambla
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We needed a room with an extra bed, since a friend was going to meet us in Barcelona after a cruise. This was one of the only hotels that I could find. We were put in room #2 on the ground floor. The room was fairly small, but it did have a small refrigerator. The room was clean, and the mattress was comfortable. They had a room where they locked our luggage the first day until we could check in. Bring a voltage converter if you want to charge your electronics. They do not have an ice machine, but the night worker twice got me a few ice cubes. The breakfast is different, with various lunch items, but I understand that might be typical for that area. It was pretty good, and so were the breakfast beverages. The hotel is an easy 15 minute walk north to Sagrada Familia (and the blue "Hop On" touristic bus). And, it is not a bad 20 minute walk west to where you can catch the red "Hop On" route. There is a 2 story grocery store around the corner, and a mini-mart nearby. Ana, at the front desk, was very friendly and could speak English and quickly got us a taxi on our last day.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel's location is great (just down the street from Sagrada Familia), the included breakfast was nice - the room was a bit small but it was very clean. The staff is friendly and helpful. I recommend the hotel
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Even though the hotel is located 20 -30 minutes walk from some of the major sights, it has some restaurants, bakeries & small grocery stores nearby. The place is clean and the staffs are very helpful. Specially mentioned the gentleman at the front desk Pablo at the front desk helped me to print the boarding passes when the public printer was not working and I was operating with my ipad to send him the information. He was very patient and friendly.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was clean and good, nice people. The breakfast was also ferry well. The room was clean, but the television was broken, but we dont look at all to tv, lol.restaurants where in the neighborhood, and all good food.
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nothing bad to say, everything went very well. Staff was friendly and spoke good english. The last morning we leave before breakfast time, so staff packed very lovely breakfast to take with us. Thank you!
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved the hotel pretty close to La Sagrada Familia. Metro station nearby also a lot of convenient stores around that area and if you are looking for a laundry mate there’s one up the street super close. Overall the room we got was on the first floor so it was a spacious room but we could hear the water coming down from the drains and yes the walls are somewhat thin because in 2 occasions we heard a baby crying out loud and a phone going off super early but it’s a nice hotel staff really friendly and complimentary breakfast!!
hotelName:
14    Hotel Sant Antoni
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this amazing hotel for one night pre-cruise. It is situated in a great area with lots of shopping and easy access to other nearby sights. We took advantage of the warm summer evening and had some snacks and drinks up on the rooftop which has a great view. The beds were very comfortable and the room was very clean. The bathroom was also very nice with a great shower. We were given complimentary bottled water in our room. We asked for a quiet room and weren’t disappointed. There were double doors in our room that opened and overlooked a small patio space for the apartments around the hotel. It didn’t bother us at all and added to the charm. The staff were also very friendly and helpful. We asked to leave our luggage while we killed some time in the Gothic Quarter before leaving for our cruise the next morning and the staff were very accommodating. They were also very helpful with suggestions about where to shop and eat. Tickets are also sold at the front desk for the Sagrada Familia cathedral if you’re looking for some although you can only purchase them once you are at the hotel. We wished we could have had a longer stay at this hotel. We hope to return again and would highly recommend this lovely hotel.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The quality of the accommodations here fully lived up to their billing, the staff were very responsive and helpful, the breakfasts were excellent & the location in the Gothic District central & convenient for enjoying Barcelona. The small pool on the roof and the bar that overlooked the Cathedral were a very nice addition to the experience. I would recommend with no qualifications.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a lovely stay at H10 MADISON!We were greeted by Oriol with a cup of champagne and was the best and smooooooth check-in ever had! Our room wasn't ready but he made the effort to call us when It was. We stayed In the Clasic Barcelona which was fine!The hotel is in such a great location, next to the Gothic Catedral and within walking distance from all the major attractions!We'll be back if we visit Barcelona again.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found this hotel to have the best location in Barcelona for walking tours of the Gothic Quarter. The Hotel was very comfortable and the staff friendly and accommodating to my needs as a wheelchair user.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was spacious and the pool area just perfect for relaxing. The location couldn’t have been better. We walked to the beach, Segrada Familia and we were a stone’s throw from Las Ramblas. Highly recommend
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location in the Gothic quarter very close to the Cathedral. Recently renovated building. Very clean room and common areas. Nice roof top patio area with small plunge pool. Very professional (and friendly) staff. Good main floor restaurant, which included breakfast (hot and cold items). The room was fairly spacious and our room included a small sitting area. Our hotel room was very nice; however, our hotel room had very limited closet and very limited storage space. Adequate size room safe in closet. The room was very quiet. Free bottled water in the room each day. We will return!!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The H10 Madison is a superb hotel in an absolutely great district. The front lobby is beautiful with examples of Picasso and great design. Front desk staff is excellent. Naime was super friendly and helpful, 10 gold stars for her The room we had was beautiful with great amenities and a deck out onto the street. The hotel has a terrace bar with a pool and looks out to the gothic cathedral and views to the Sagrada. Absolute calm and beauty up there. This is a stunning place to be. 5 star.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a very well situated hotel that definitely deserves its lofty ratings. Rooms are well appointed and the staff definitely go the extra mile. Champagne and candies in the lobby are a nice touch.Highly recommended!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Highly recommend this quality 4 star. New and modern rooms in a beautiful old building. Very convenient location with easy walking distance to everything. Has shutters, quality windows and good blinds so you can shut the world out and get some rest after a long journey. Food and service was impeccable with the exception of the waiter at the pool. What a jerk. Enjoy!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are 3 generations of family travelling pre cruise on our first trip to Barcelona. This hotel did not disappoint. On arrival we were made very welcome as we were every time we passed reception, I honestly cannot remember the last time I experienced this in a hotel! With a smile and a hello. It’s a great location near the stunning gothic quarter, our balcony had a view of the cathedral. We walked to the marina, Ramblas and found taxis cheap when we went a little further. The breakfast is excellent and a great start to the day too. Highly recommend this hotel and hope to return again.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In the heart of the gothic quarter, literally a stone’s throw from Barcelona Cathedral. Could not have been more central. Accommodation was comfortable and well appointed albeit appreciably a little cramped (given age, size and location of the buildings in the area). If I was lucky enough to go back to Barcelona I would gladly stay here again.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Exceptional good food. Loved the Madison Burger Super breakfast. The rooms are new and luxurious.Best service from Valentina, Carla, Miguel, Andrea and Mingo!!!Perfect location in the center of Barcelona.Reception is very competent.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment you drive up and the bellman is shuttling your luggage to the front desk, to the friendly and courteous front staff this is a super hotel. The hotel is centrally located and walking distance to just about everything. We had a corner room on the 6th floor and it was quite large. Nice small balcony and large bathroom. Very clean and well maintained. This was one of the quietest hotels we have ever stayed at. Although there is a lot street noise you could not hear any of it with the doors and windows closed. AC worked great. Worth a stay if you are looking for a very nice hotel.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Every aspect of H10 Madison was excellent. We were there 8 nights (vacation) and I loved every minute of it. No criticism - constructive or otherwise.The rooms are large and the mattresses are very comfortable. The furnishings and decor is very attractive. The showers were great. The rooms were cleaned every day. I appreciated the lighting very much - made it great for reading and whatever else. The food in the restaurant for breakfast was excellent every day. The relaxing atmosphere on the roof was ideal for reading and relaxing. All of the staff were personable and helpful. I couldn't have been happier and would love to go back.I would stay in another H10 hotel, no question.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for two nights and had a great time. The hotel is lovely - clean with excellent amenities. The staff are amazing, the roof top bar is just fabulous with amazing views. The hotel is in a perfect location, easily accessible from the airport on the Aerobús. I would definitely stay here again when visiting Barcelona
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A great hotel in a fabulous location. The staff were very helpful and friendly. Breakfast was great lots of choice. Rooms lovely and clean and towels and toiletries replenished every day. Provided a coffee machine but also a kettle and tea bags on request. It was my husbands birthday and they even brought him a small cake and bubbly at breakfast. Would definitely return
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love this hotel. It’s the best one to stay in Barcelona. Really safe area, great rooftop view and pool. Beautiful balcony and views, including the Barcelona Cathedral. The staff here is incredible, kind, helpful abd accommodating. From the front desk to the amazing staff at breakfast, they make you feel special, all wonderful people and service. We were welcomed with Champagne and water all day, everyday. Chocolates every night has been perfectly decadent. Beautiful clean rooms and clean marble bathrooms. Rooftop is one of the best parts. Absolutely glorious! We almost stayed at a large US style restaurant for our family size but it was off on its own on a peninsula. Over here, everything is close by. Good food, shopping, entertainment (flamenco show at Palau de la Musica) , sites and views.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: H10 Madison is located near Cathedral, very nice rooms, very helpful/friendly staff, and a super breakfast! Roof top bar/pool also cool. We highly recommend this location in Barcelona. (Can be a bit tricky for taxi to find if not familiar w/ gothic quarter.)
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fab hotel. Roof terrace a real bonus. Breakfast too pricey but so central that far better to have breakfast out anyway. Lovely views. Staff very helpful and friendly. Loved the double shower. Large comfy beds- even sofa bed wad a double.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a fairly recently refurbished hotel in the heart of the Gothic quarter in Barcelona.The location is ideal for exploring the city and the hotel is excellent.we were greeted at reception with a free glass of "champagne" and this was available in the foyer permanently along with sweets and soft drinks. The rooms were well furnished and hot drink facilities, water and chocolates include free of charge. The bed was very comfortable, air conditioning and ceiling fan worked well in 30 degree temperatures. Excellent bathroom with quality toiletries.Reception staff were very friendly and helpful, booking taxis and advising on the city sights.Overall one of the best affordable hotels we have stayed in.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All the great reviews I read about this hotel are not just hype. It is one of the best hotels my family and I have ever stayed in (2 rooms for 3 nights), and we are very picky. First, the reception staff who, to a person, were welcoming, friendly, and knowledgeable. Special thanks go to Pedro and a young woman with a light brown ponytail whose name started with N (sorry I didn't get her full name). They were patient with endless questions, funny, offered great suggestions for sightseeing and dining, and were just plain delightful. The standard room was a good size, clean, and had the most comfortable bed I've ever had in a hotel. The H10 Madison's location is perfect, literally down the block from the Cathedral and the concert hall, walking distance to many of the major attractions, and a two-block walk to the metro that takes you to virtually every other one. In mid-afternoon, after a full round of sightseeing, the rooftop bar and pool area is a welcome respite with a great view. While only a plunge pool, it is refreshing, the atmosphere is relaxing, bar service is prompt and friendly, and we never had a problem finding clean towels. Prior to this trip, we had never heard of the H10 brand, but given the experience the Madison offered us, I will always look for H10 first in my future travels. Thank you for a great start to a wonderful trip.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with my son in an interior room with a pullout couch. It was large and very comfortable for us to share. I'm a very light sleeper and we were on the 6th floor- I was worried noise would travel from above but it did not. It was super quiet. If you are sensitive to noise I recommend the interior rooms, as the main street would be pretty noisy to face. This hotel worked to delight us and the staff were really nice, all of them-- thank you Pedro as check in, but really everyone. Hardworking and attentive. The rooftop is really nice to go up to-- great views but also quiet and peaceful, even when crowded, at least for us. Wait staff on the roof also super nice and hardworking. Location is fantastic. I was worried about staying in a hotel chain I was unfamiliar with, but they were great and I'd definitely stay with them again here or at another one. Perfect stylish, clean and calm base for exploring the city.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very central and has a great view and access to Cathedral Square. The staff for check-in were very nice and helpful. However, after check-in, only one time the rest of our entire stay ever say hello or welcome back when we came into the hotel. The housekeeping staff on the other hand were extremely friendly and always said good morning and asked if everything was ok. The rooms are really wonderful - great size and amenties. Comfy beds, large bathrooms (esp by European standards), bottled water and coffee. Ceiling fans are a really nice touch and helps with keeping AC down. We had a room with a small balcony which was great so you could sit and listen to the city. If you lean out you can see the cathedral. The rooftop pool is one of the main reasons we booked this hotel. The view is amazing and the setting is beautiful and modern. The pool area does seems a little neglected as far as attention as there was only one time we went when they weren't out of towels.. Additionally, know that the bar/cafe is NYC priced which is not unexpected but the service there was extremely hit or miss. I sat by the pool for and hour and 45 minutes one afternoon while my son was swimming and no one ever approached to see if I needed anything, and our last night when it was raining a little so it was very empty the waitress would look our way and turn around. We finally went to the bar where everyone was just standing talking and asked if we could get drinks. Also, the day we got food, the waiter kept bringing us chips even after we asked not to which would normally be great but not when they are charging 2 euros a pop - so watch for that. The breakfast at the hotel is ridiculously expensive but right across the street are no less than three cafes where you can get breakfast and coffee for significantly less money. Cafe 365 and Cappuccino were our favorites - we could breakfast for 4 for the cost of breakfast for 1 at the hotel.I would still fully recommend this hotel as even with these bumps, it was an extremely postive experience.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My boyfriend and I were very much looking forward to staying in the H10 Madison and it didn’t disappoint. We received an amenity for booking directly, and they even surprised us with chocolate covered strawberries and rosé cava to make our trip even more romantic. The service was excellent, and the breakfast was amazing. I will definitely try other H10 hotels because of our experience!Thank you!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel in an awesome location. You can walk 5-10 minutes to tons of gothic quarter restaurants and 15 min up to the Passeig de Gracia and 10 minutes to Las Ramblas. Really central location to hit up all the main Barcelona sites. Rooms were very nice and air conditioning super strong even in the very hot August weather. Great service from the staff all around and a great view from the upstairs terrace and pool area. Would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We just returned from Spain having spent five nights at this lovely hotel. The staff are amazing, the rooftop bar and pool are was a perfect way to relax at the end of our day and the views are stunning. The first look out our room was one I will never forget. The view of the Cathedral was unbelievable! The rooms are clean and modern. The bathroom is a bit tight for two people. We can’t say enough about this lovely choice of hotel as the staff, views and location made it fabulous! The breakfast option is a bit pricey and in hindsight I wouldn’t have chosen it all five mornings. Don’t think twice about booking. You will love it!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was right opposite the Cathedral and close to everything. It was modern, friendly service and great facilities. The rooftop bar is great with small pool that wasn’t too busy. So comfortable and just like home. Great views too!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: H10 Madison is located a block from the cathedral in the Gothic Quarter. We were able to walk to most places easily. Taxis are readily available on the street near the hotel for further locations. The hotel bar/restaurant near the pool was a great respite after each days sightseeing. Cava, water and candy was available in the lobby for guests. The view from the rooftop can't be beat!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a great hotel. Check in was efficient and friendly. All staff were very helpful. Our room was clean and comfortable. I slept so well - the air conditioning was excellent, the room was quiet and the blackout curtains ensured late waking. Highly recommended and I hope to return on my next visit to my favourite city. Thank you / Diolch
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved this hotel. It was in a good location, very clean and the staff was all very friendly and helpful.It is not close to the Gaudi La Familia. Really need to take a taxi if you are planning on going there.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We needed to find a hotel in Barcelona at the last minute and utilized tripadvisors. This hotel is located in our favorite area of Barcelona to explore by foot (Gothic Quarter) so we chose it after looking at the photos. We could not be happier. The staff, the rooms, the food, and the rooftop bar are all exceptional. For being in central Barcelona the room is whisper quiet and beautifully appointed. We were able to upgrade from a Classic to a Superior room after one day and now have a view of the Cathedral. As good as it gets!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife booked this hotel based on the location and the roof top pool. Neither have disappointed. The views from the pool are stunning and the service is very good.The room is spacious and comfortable. The bonus is the breakfast. We had it included as part of our rate. There is an expansive buffet and in addition you can order off the menu. Far and away the best European breakfast I have ever had. Great way to start your day of site seeing.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the team was excellent, the breakfast was excellent, the room was amazing. overall we really did enjoy it so much. but so make sure to go to the top bar and enjoy the view of the cathedral; it is totally mesmerizing
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved this hotel. Very warm and genuine greeting from the front desk upon arrival. Welcome drink provided of champagne and water.Tasteful rooms with adorable little balconies (we had a regular room with King bed) in a great area of Barcelona right outside the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Right outside the Cathedral of Barcelona, walking distance to many attractions like La Rambla, Boquiera market, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Hop on and Hop off stop very close by.Excellent staff, service and well managed hotel. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the city.The only negative was no gym which was unfortunate.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a fantastic hotel in a fantastic location, the terrace on the top floor has amazing views there is a lovely plunge pool, bar and tapas service. Our room on the fourth floor was lovely i feel it had not long been refurnished we were over looking a busy road but with windows shut there was NO noise and had wonderful blackout curtains and the room was kept wonderfully clean. The staff are a credit to this hotel very friendly and helpful from the front desk staff, breakfast staff and also up on the terrace.I was celebrating my birthday while there so at breakfast i had a nice surprise from the staff and when returning to our room that evening another nice surprise,[not saying what it was so not to spoil for others] its those touches that help make a memorable stay and we would not hesitate to return.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: H10 Madison was the perfect hotel for my trip to Barcelona! The location is beautiful and located in the gothic area, the staff is friendly, the breakfast is yummy, and the rooftop area is fun to hang out at. Join the H10 club so you get free drinks! (I recommend the Mojitos)
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We absolutely loved our stay at the H10 Madison - a beautiful hotel, friendly staff and truly a great, walkable location. The bathroom was gorgeous and the towels are so thick and decadent. The rooftop has amazing views and we had drinks there many nights. We never took a taxi once on our trip and the hotel is easy access to some great restaurants. We loved the Mexican restaurant across the street and had omlettes each morning at the place right next door. You walk out the door and theres the Barcelona cathedral and then a quick walk to Las Rambles. 10/10!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in a basic room on the second floor and it was great, comfortable and good temperature control. Solid water pressure. Customer service at the hotel was spectacular, pool bar staff were so friendly. Highly recommend
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our family vacation took an unexpected turn when my husband had to have emergency surgery almost immediately after our flight landed in Barcelona. Rodolphe Pottier, the Front Desk Manager, and his team were amazing. They helped us navigate the Spanish medical/hospital system, got a doctor to our hotel room at midnight, helped with translating and were so kind, gentle and helpful. My daughter and I were taken exceptional care of while my husband was in the hospital. We cannot say enough about everyone at the hotel. Truly kind and gracious people! The hotel is also stunning and perfectly located. We will be back next year and will hopefully have better luck!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is pretty faultless.It's very smart, well located with friendly staff and great facilities.Rooms are recently refurbished, and nicely finished. Beds and bedding are luxurious and comfortable and sound insulation was excellent with no road noise.Rooftop bar and pool are lovely and never seem to be too crowded. Staff can't do enough for you and regularly seek feedback. Would stay again without hesitation. Great.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is centrally located within the few (5') min of cab ride to Sagrada Familia, Park Guell, Cam Nou, and other popular spots. The streets around it are full of charm with plenty of restaurants, shops, live entertainment. This hotel is simply AMAZING! The property is very nice, beautiful views from the terrace, clean, modern, but the staff is what makes this property exceptional and very enjoyable! All I've met with no exception was simply great in every way. I will most certainly go back to this property as it has all one can need while exploring this beautiful city!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time in an H10 hotel. I will look for this chain again while traveling. Booking was easyCheckin was easy. Front desk staff very helpful and accommodating for my partner who had to do a job interview remotely at 12 am. They found him a space in the lobby and turned off the overhead music for him. Excellent customer service! We stayed 3 nights and I could have spent a week here. Room was cleanBeds are very comfortable and we always slept too late because the blackout curtains and sound-proofing work really well! The air conditioning worked well too. We had a “family room”, which was a queen size bed and full size sofa bed. Both are very comfortable. Bathroom was also clean with plenty of towels and soft robes. My only critical comment about the room is that there were not enough hooks to hang towels, the hand held shower wand wouldn’t turn on, and the seal at the bottom of the shower wasn’t tight and let water leak out to the floor. I didn’t tell the hotel about these things as they seemed really minor. The rooftop bar is good sized with friendly waitstaff. The plunge pool is relatively small but perfect for a plunge. There is plenty of seating with both tables and lounge chairs. There is a complimentary drink if you are a member of their “club”. Food seemed a little overpriced for what us was and there are lots of places to eat nearby so we didn’t eat there. The cathedral and gothic quarter are less than a block away. It’s a perfect location from which to explore the city!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed one night pre-cruise. The hotel was perfect in every way - new and beautiful, lovely staff, outstanding location, awesome toiletries, champagne in the lobby, charming rooftop with a bar . . . We had a standard rooms, which were small, but beautifully appointed, and the bathroom were spacious. You will not be disappointed.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I arrived at the hotel late at almost 10pm because our flight was delayed. I regret not remembering her name, but the hotel staff at the front desk received us above and beyond. She completed the check in very swiftly with positive attitude and suggested we catch our breath in the lobby seating area. When we were going for the water in the lobby area, she asked if we wanted champagne instead which we delightfully agreed. She had one hotel staff to open new champagne bottle for us while she arrange our luggage. The hotel has beautiful modern decorations with local influence and very bright. The hotel elevator has a lot of room so both my husband and I could fit with our two big luggage without problems.We stayed at a double bed room which was spacious overlooking an alley. The decor is again beautiful and very comfortable. Everything seems new and in great condition. There were small chocolates as a welcome gift. The hotel also has beautiful restaurant, rooftop bar, and rooftop pool. The view from the rooftop area is not to be missed. You can see (and hear) the cathedral and basically the whole Gothic area view.We booked our room to include breakfast and the selection was phenomenal. When we were seated down, we were first given a menu for selection of eggs, sides, and sweets (waffle, crepe, etc). We were also offered different types of coffee or tea. But other than the menu, we also had access to the buffet area that had wide array of deli cheese/meat, juices, sweets, fruits, etc. And they were all arranged beautifully.The hotel location is also perfect for us. We enjoyed our short walk to the Gothic neighborhood, Picasso Museum, and Ciutadella Park. There were tons of bakeries, restaurants and artist shops in Gothic area. I will definitely come back to this hotel.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We absolutely loved our stay at the H10 Madison Hotel. From the welcome glass of champagne to the attentive and friendly staff to the perfectly appointed room - every part of our stay far exceeded our expectations. It is in a great location right in the middle of the Barri Gotic, with all of the narrow winding streets to get lost in. We will stay here again!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really enjoyed our stay.The front desk staff were efficient and friendly.The location was great for exploring the city.The rooms were spacious and the beds very comfortable.I would highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Warm greeting from our hostess Naima when we checked in made us feel welcome right away! Mathieu poured us champagne and took our bags as we checked in.. what a great start to vacation! We loved the room with the big showers, comfy bed, and the roof with drinks and a pool. Everyone who works there is incredibly kind. This ranks as one of the best hotels, if not the best, that we’ve ever been to. Oh yea, it’s a no brainer location too!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment we walked in, I knew I was in heaven at H10 Madison. Greeted with a glass of Cava and a smile. Room is spotless, comfortable (not as small as you'd expect), bathroom is gorgeous and the rooftop is perfect at the end of the day for a cocktail and gorgeous views of Barri Gotic. Great place. ***** (5 stars!)
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Brilliant location, near metro which is super easy to use. We got a 3 day HOLA card which allows you to use on bus & metro & the metro even takes you to the airport so you’re all set for 18 euros each. Bargain. Citymapper helped lots, could use on our EE normal data package. The hotel was comfortable, so clean, little luxury details from bathroom range to treats by lobby. Service was always friendly they held our luggage after checkout as we had time to explore before return flight. As it was over Valentines Day we came back to a champagne bottle & chocolates on day 2. So sweet. Rooftop terrace has pool & views of city with a bar! Beds are so comfortable, balcony a bonus with city views. I would defo return! Got this on a deal via booking.com otherwise h10s can be pricey!We went to so many delicious food spots there is so much choice! From Paella, Tapas to Brunch & Churros! Bakeries are yum!Best bakery near beach: baluardBest brunches: MILK in Gothic Quarter & MARMALADE in Raval great decor food coffee & live djWe had tapas from La Pepita & its a tiny spot gotta squeeze in. Prob better for drinks!There are cute places everywhere so go for a wander! I also went to see Sagrada Familla catherdral and had a lovely coffee about a 7 min walk up the hill. Sunny although Feb! Cant wait to return!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very short walk into the Gothic Quarter, in the shadow of the Barcelona Cathedral. The rooms were very nice, and the staff was exceptionally helpful. Making restaurant recommendations and reservations. Calling a taxi when needed. I hope to return to Barcelona for a stay at the H10 Madison.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband, our 2 boys age 9 and 12, and I stayed here for 2 nights before a cruise out of Barcelona. This hotel was perfect. It’s more of a boutique hotel and very modern. Didn’t feel like a chain. Perfect location. You can walk to a bunch of sights and just wander around the Gothic Quarter and La Rambla during the day and night. We hailed a taxi right in front of the hotel to take us to Sagrada Família (book your tickets online). The front desk staff helped us book tickets to the FCA Barca Camp Nau (which my son wanted to see) and they also helped us get a taxi to the cruise port, and booked our hotel transfer from the airport. The staff spoke English which was helpful. We stayed in a suite, which worked for us. I emailed the hotel ahead of time and they helped me book it. Our view was of an alley and residential balconies, seemed pretty quiet. Surprisingly, however, at 11:45 pm on Friday night a local neighbor set of fireworks off the rooftop right next to our room window. Kind of interesting/cool/festive. It was LGTBQ pride parade weekend so maybe it was just celebratory fireworks, not sure if it’s the norm. My son went in the rooftop pool while husband and I had a drink up there. They provide bathrobes in the rooms, which my son wore up to the roof, so the experience had a spa-like feel. Pool is small but a good place to rest and relax for about an hour or so. Awesome photo opp of the cathedral. My only complaint is the rooftop drink/food service was awkwardly slow. Breakfast was excellent, and the food service was top notch. Complimentary water and espresso machine in the room was nice, too. it was really a great way to start our vacation. I wish we had stayed there in Barcelona a couple more nights.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful stay at the hotel for 4 nights in July. From the moment we arrived the service was great and the facilities faultless. We’ll definitely be visiting again in the future. Also lovely view from the pool terrace and bar!
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a 4 night stay at H10 Maddison with our twin teenagers. The hotel is located just 10 mins from La Rambla and 3 mins from Court D’Anglais—the best shopping area, 10 mins from Paseo De Garcia. Ample cabs are located across from the hotel. The hotel is very clean and modern with plenty of free bottled water and amenities. The buffet breakfast is wonderful. Loved the creeps, gluten free bread and desserts. Folks complained about the elevator and frankly it was no problem at all! We enjoyed taking the trains to the near by town of Sitges which had a great beach. Overall a great trip at a great location. Special shout out to the front desk crew Asier who always had a smile and great ideas for places to visit. Silvia who was new was wonderful as well. The breakfast team was fantastic as well—Ravinder and her colleagues.
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My daughter and I have thoroughly enjoyed the location, service, and spacious roomhere. Super location by the cathedral and lovely rooftop terrace and pool. Only caution (and a small one), is the only night we asked the front desk to recommend a restaurant, it was terrible (mediocre food and poor service).
hotelName:
15    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Friendly staff. Tatiana (front desk manager) was beyond helpful. Her smile and demeanor are beyond compare. Excellent value comfortable beds plenty of room for luggage for 3 adults in room for 3. Rooftop terrace and poo. A plus. 6
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in an excellent location for public transport enabling us to travel from air port easily and get around the City. The hotel and our room was what we expected, our room was small but adequate and spotlessly clean. Breakfast was varied and plentiful and the staff were helpful and kind.The only negative is I would have liked a pre-breakfast swim and the pool did not open early enough.Would recommend.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As I have stated here in many occasions and written about it there’s not much more to say good location near metro with easy links to airport Friendly staff and clean hotel with a number of nice bars and restaurants near byGood value
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great experience. What I really liked was that they took our luggage and put it in a safe place after check out and held it for us as while we visited Barcelona. We also had access to the pool, restrooms, and cafeteria (free cofee) even after check out.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was a good size and clean. The bed was comfortable and a bottle of complimentary still water was provided on first night. The bathroom and shower was very good with free toiletries included. Free coffee was available at breakfast and between 1-8pm. I booked this hotel specifically for the area I was visiting. Although the area is not great it was safe enough.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here 4 nights in May 2019. Worked out perfectly for our travels, and we were very pleased. The hotel was spotless, in a quiet neighborhood and the staff was exceptional. Shout out to Albert (front desk) Sandra and Sara (breakfast) They were especially friendly, helpful and welcoming: a great representation of Barcelona's hospitality. The hotel room and the the beds were comfortable. We were too busy to utilize the pool but that would be a bonus. Would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really enjoyed the hotel and especially the breakfastThe gym is clean the swim pool is small but very nice with a great view as it's at the last level (level 8)People working there are very helpful and always smiling.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were in this hotel for 5 nights, and we were very pleased with the hotel and the staff. The checking in and out went smoothly, everything was correct. The room was nice and tidy, also the bathroom was extremely clean. This hotel is close to the metro station ‘Clot’ so the public transportation was also easy to use. The air conditioner worked great, we only had one problem, the last night the card which opened our door, didn’t work, but they solved this problem fast. This is a recommended place to stay while you are visiting Barcelona. (My boyfriend thought the bed was not too comfortable, it was fine for me.)
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staying at the Catalonia Albeniz has left wonderful memories. Excellent and friendly attitude of the staff. Great location and excellent value for money. The rooms are clean, cleaned every day. A pleasant impression was left by the terrace with a swimming pool on the roof. It was very pleasant to receive congratulations on the birthday from the hotel.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a clean room. With good mattress and pillows. We slept very well. The location was also good. The only negative of our room was the view from the window. Actually there was no view. We had a wall just in front of our window. It was like we were at the basement while we were at the first floor.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a lovely little hotel this was! Myself and my girlfriend stayed here for a long weekend break and we didn't regret it. We were told upon arrival that we were being upgraded to a superior room due to it being my girlfriends birthday during our stay which was a nice surprise. On the day of my girlfriends birthday we came back to the room to find a fruit platter and a bottle of cava :-). The room was clean (as was all of the hotel) bed was comfy and the staff very efficient and polite. The breakfast in the hotel is tasty and good value for money. The location of the hotel was perfect too as it is a stones throw from the metro and shops/restaurants. All in all, we had a great time at this hotel and wouldn't hesitate to come back!
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The stay at the hotel was totally enjoyable. The staff was super friendly, the room was small, but very comfortable to stay.The location was super - you can get to the sea by foot in about 25 minutes and you can get by the public bus to the mountains in about 20 minutes. Fantastic!
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here Easter weekend and throughly enjoyed it. Very clean. Staff all very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was lovely. Coffee available all day for free. The one time it wasn’t changing the machine) staff were kind enough to ring us when it was available. Unfortunately just didn’t have time to use the gym or pool so can’t comment on those facilities. Located 5 minute walk from a metro (tube) station. We found the Metro very safe and easy to use and went all over Barcelona via it. Would definitely stay here again. Only negative I have is you must be allowed to smoke in the room as there is an ashtray and the pillows literally stank of old smoke. Not pleasant for a non smoker and a child. Maybe a good idea to have non smoking rooms. Otherwise loved it.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our choice of Catalonia Albeniz was the right one. The staff is great - we would like to say Thanks a lot for one more time.The breakfast is very good. You can also have a cup of coffee/tea all over the day Warm Greetings to Erika from Alina :)
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: very friendly staff at the front desk, lovely hotel in a good quiet area, very clean rooms and cleaned daily to a high standard. Very easy to find with metro stations close by Highly recommend to friends and family.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This Hotel is clean (except one room smelling tobacco but I've been able to get another immediatly). Very convenient with a good breakfast and a small gym. Beds are comfortable. Location is near transportation and sagrada familia. Service efficient and friendly. just one disappointment : the terrasse swimming pool was too cold in the middle of January :)
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The breakfast is 4 star quality compared to any EU hotel. If you like walking, you do not need any transportation to reach the city center (nearly at 1 hour walking distance). The heating was very good. The employees are very friendly. Thanks to each of them again.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have just returned from a 4 day break at this hotel,Myself and my son (17)and my mum and dad,the staff were so helpful,showed us where all the sites were,across the road is the Clot Metro,really easy to use,and a fab restaurant called El Clot,fab food great prices too.i am a travel agent and would recommend this hotel to all my customers wanting a great hotel.we also went to the stadium tour and the Match on the sunday,great experience for all.Breakfast was a good choice too Thank you for a great stay,i will return to this hotel
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you Vako! You are amazingly friendly and helpful. Always do the best to make me feel comfortable. I am really grateful for the early check in you helped arrange. You are like a good friend. I can totally feel your sincerity to help the guest with passion.The hotel and staff are perfect like comfy bed and convenient location. Just a shame that other guests on my floor are loud and keep me awake. But as soon as i informed the reception about it, they came up to solve it immediately. Would definitely recommend the hotel and stay again.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you need the place from where you can travel and explore the city of Barcelona than this hotel might be good selection. It is close to metro, clean and with very friendly staff speaking proper English. Breakfast is fair and if BB is what you need than consider this hotel.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is situated about 3 minutes away from the nearest metro (clot) so easy access to all the major city attractions. The hotel itself is very clean and a pleasant place to stay. Rooms are cleaned every day with clean towels. The staff are very friendly and helpful.The only negative point I can make is the breakfast wasn’t great there was never enough hot food made so there was always a wait. Although this did not spoil our stay we would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic welcome from very friendly and helpful staff. The only timr we have been welcomed to Spain by anywhere staying in hotels for 3 weeks! Room a bit small for 3 but very clean. Very good location close to buses and sights. Would recommend.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great value for money! Lovely staff, good location- not too far from the center but not at all creepy or dark. Loved the room, vert neet and clean, breakfast was awesome and had so many different things to choose from, including soy milk for lactose intolerant people, which totally upgraded my experience
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here at Catalonia Albeniz for 3 days 16.09-19.09. We stayed at 3 star hotel that provides 5 star service!We had unforgettable experience. First of all thank you for an amazing service! All the members of the team were great and so helpful! Receptions (exspecially the man who made our check in 16.09.2018 at about 21.00 , sorry I don’t remember your name.. and Erika), housekeeper, women at breakfast area, manager. Clean rooms with everyday housekeeping (including new towels!), good view from the balcony. Great locations!! Metro stations (El Clot) 3 min away (so it took us only 30 min to get to the hotel from the El Prat Airport! Sagrada Familia 10 min away! And the beach about 30 min to go.So good breakfast for the value price! Also we were allowed to drink coffee, tea or water during the day and we could eat some snacks just for free!Price is really good for what we got!So I would strongly recommend this hotel and I will defenetly come back!Thank you and keep this level!
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couldn’t ask for better service. Our party of 6 were made very welcome by the staff especially on Reception,who were very helpful. The hotel is in a great location with excellent Metro links and nearby restaurants.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel, located close to the metro and a close walk to Sagrada Familia. Welcoming and friendly staff, with a very clean room and nice breakfast. The staff on reception were extremely helpful.Would stay again!
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 3 star hotel which provides a 5 star service. The hotel was excellent from the moment we arrived until the moment of our departure. The staff on the reception desk were extremely helpful and took time to provide whatever information was asked. The rooms were very clean and comfortable as was the hotel. There is also a gym in the basement which seemed a good size. The hotel is located 5 minutes from the nearest underground as well as the train station which also serves the airport. From the underground, travel to Barcelona centre was easy, as was our day trip to Girona using the train station.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here with my 20 year old daughter, and was more then we expected ! From the moment we arrived we were created by a lovely receptionist, we had arrived early from airport as we took the RENFE train which brought us straight to El Clot-Arago station and took 30 minutes and hotel only 5 mins away, so we were only planning on dropping off bags but luckily our room was early so we had a chance to change. The location of hotel is perfect for the metro and from the terrace floor 8 you can Sagrada Familia. We mainly used hotel as a base. We did get the bus number 92 from up the street to Park Guell only took 30 mins and saved 20 minute walk up hill from tube. The room was lovely and clean and the beds comfortable the bathroom a little small the bath/shower is very close to toilet. The is a fridge in room which was very useful, unfortunately no kettle in room, but a coffee machine in reception and coffee available with breakfast which we didn't book, there was also of the offer of afternoon tea which was free but we never made it to try it.The hotel was very quiet other then the fire alarm going off at 6am because of one selfish person smoking in their room!And the guests that let there doors slam shut! Not hotels thought just selfish people. The pool although small which we knew before arriving was perfect after a hot day, and often quiet empty of other guests. And a another selfish person had a shower after swim then went straight to lift without towelling off first so a lovely slippery hazard.Food wise they have a varied room service list that they can order in for you. Also some local supermarkets that are great for picking up some cold beers or wine at reasonable prices. So on closing I would highly recommend this hotel all the staff are so friendly.
hotelName:
16    Catalonia Albeniz
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
