review_body: The location was great, 15 minute walk from Plaza Espana, 10 minutes from La Rambla. The room was big, very clean, and simple. The bed was comfortable and the breakfast was good, even though it could be more diverese.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about the hotel is great but you must get a room that doesn’t overlook the busy main road . I stayed for three nights but general road noise and people talking outside my room meant I had very little sleep .
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff are very lovely, the room is very nice, a little bit noisy during the day but not during the nightLocation is great, lots of nice bakeries nearby and metro is very closeVery happy with our stay, would recommend and stay again!
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location just 10 Minutes walk to La Rambla and 15 minutes walk to the harbour area. Only 2 star hotel but clean and spacious. For 3 nights with friends it was perfect. Staff friendly enough. Very much what was expected plus a bit
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Arrived at 12, was told the room would be ready at 3. Was not able to use the room before quarter to 4.Second day, the room was not cleaned, Third day, was promised the room would be cleaned before noon, but it wasn't. Talg to the reception staff several times, as you can it didn't help.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We found the Hotel to be clean, very comfortable and in a good location. The hotel is close to Metro, the port, and various interesting sites The staff are friendly and the helpful. We would not have any reservations in recommending this hotel to stay at
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not being one to spend excessive amounts of time in the hotel during a city break this was the ideal hotel for us. Very close to the metro with short hops to all major locations, but likewise walkable to the Gothic Quarter, Beach, Montjuic etc. Nearby bars and restaurants serving good food. The room itself was practical, air conditioned and comfortable.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff very friendly and helpful, breakfast a bit basic. Hotel rooms could do with a little updating. Our bathroom had been damaged by water leaking from the shower cubicle.Location was quite good for visiting local attractions even on foot.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very good, the staff are so friendly and helpful, the location is great near to all the good places in Barcelona, There’s only one tiny complaint about the hotel, which is the room lights (at least the one I stayed in), it was very poor specially with the dark interior design. Other than that everything was great. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is planning to visit Barcelona.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recently stayed for three 3 nights,its a great hotel in a fab location.So close to everything.Hotel is spotless and the staff were so so friendly.Breakfast was brilliant with a great selection of hot and cold dishes. Will definitely use this hotel again. Great value for money.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great stay - would certainly go back. Went with my other half for my 21st birthday. Came back to the hotel on that day to find a piece of cake with a candle and written on the mirror - Happy Birthday. Would recommend the hotel to anyone. 5-10 minute walk and you was on the rambles. Staff friendly and very helpful.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel

review_body: This was a great hotel. The service was great and the breakfast buffet. The room was a small, but the internet service was fast. The location of the hotel is really good. I would recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The position is great, close to the metro station and just 15 minutes walk to Ramblas and the port. The room has enough space for 2 people, the bed is really comfortable. Internally, very nice. Comfy bed, excellent bathroom and staff were very helpful and friendly
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Firstly we had to chase hotel for booking confirmation after reserving via the app then we were asked to pay one week ahead up front even though the Trivago app says pay on arrival so not the best starts. The hotel is ok quite central but it’s tired the furniture is old and cheap quality but it is clean and it is very basic, beds are fine so is bathroom so if the room rate offered is reasonable and you are ok just with a clean room to sleep in it’s fine. To be honest that’s how I would sum it up. The photo is the view opposite at the rear from our window not the hotel itself but the outlook, judge for yourself if the other descriptions photos offered are representative of the area I think some are highly edited.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel

review_body: Convenient location - excellent for sightseeing various part of the city: e.g. Castel de Montjuic, La Rambla street and others places - all could be reached on foot or by close metro. Very nice service, room clean and quiet, adequate value for money. Hotel certainly worthy to be recommended.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel

review_body: The apartment was really nice clean and lots of light thoughmake the most of the balcony whilst you can and carefour supermaket is just round the corner if you fancy cooking.we had 2 cars and both had disable badge so car park was just outside the flat for Disable badge only

review_body: Very friendly atmosphere,hotel service very nice, helpful, knows your job.Excellent breakfast before starting to explore the city, a large selection of food, everything fresh, very tasty.Nothing to say about room service everything was in place.HOTEL PARAL.LEL thank you for couple nights of relax
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel

review_body: Basic Hotel In Good location for exploring the city. Room comfortable. No bar or restaurant in the hotel, however a buffet breakfast was available, fair selection.Plenty of cafes and restaurants in the area.Friendly, helpful staff on reception.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an excellent stay at Hotel Paral.lel and will definitely stay here again! The location was perfect, the rooms are clean and comfortable. Our stay would have been made more comfortable if there was a kettle and tea/coffee in the room, and black out curtains. As soon as the sun rises the room is in complete light so bring an eye mask if you are woken by the light!We also really appreciate the commitment to the environment with the towel washing system (only wash when they are left on the floor).Thank you for a brilliant stay!
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice clean hotel near metro. In a good location, you can walk anywhere. many coffee places and restaurants around, also a market just next. Friendly staff and very helpful.Only one negative it's the soundproof of the rooms.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed just the one night but couldn’t fault anything. Very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend it. It’s very central staff very helpful. Went to a concert in the Apolo which is 400 metres away
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is logical that hotels in Barcelona are cheaper in winter, but such a deal, including breakfast, I didn't expect. So, I was even more surprised that the hotel was in a nice area, modern and well equipped. The breakfast was copious and the car was parked across the street. What else to expect from a hotel not far from the middle of town.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was found by my travel agent and let's just say it didn't disappoint! It's very close to all major tourist attractions we walked a lot but you can also get local buses or taxis. It was my partners birthday when we were there so I arranged a bottle of cava on arrival which was lovely! Room was big and looked to the back of the hotel but not any noise from there sometimes in other rooms. One negative thing that happened whilst we were there was the plumbing work was getting fixed and there was a distinct smell of sewage in our room however it was soon fixed! We would definitely recommend this hotel and we hope to return in the future!!
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Firstly, the biggest surprise about this hotel is that it is just a 2 Star, and if we had searched for a hotel purely on star rating we would have overlooked this one. The staff were friendly and helpful, the rooms clean and comfortable, exactly like the pictures. The hotel was quiet, no traffic noise or noise from other guests. The breakfast was excellent, one of the best we had ever had - lots of variety. The location was also excellent. Right near the Paral -lel metro station. Its situated within easy walking distance of La Rambla via what appeared to be the very safe Carrer Nou De La Rambla. Its also an easy walk back from the magic fountain to avoid an overcrowded metro.I would certainly stay here again and recommend it to others.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at a really big and comfortable room.Nice breakfast with many choises served at a clean and not so crowded place.Great location just 10 minutes walk from las ramplas. There are many shops close to the hotel for food or whatever.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is by far one of my worst experiences when it comes to hotel accommodations. Our first visit to Barcelona back in 2015 was so pleasant that we decided to come back but unfortunately I had the worst experience at this hotel. Staff are rude and the facility is no picnic either.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Paral.lel is perfectly fine. Clean, reasonable sized en-suite room with comfortable beds. Breakfast, which was included in our price (c. €430 for 4 nights), was fine without being exceptional. The hotel is well positioned and close to metro for longer trips.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel clean, the guys at the reception helpful, Good location, nearby cafeterias and restaurants bus stop and just wave your hand for a taxi. Mini markets plentiful in the area.Metro station very close and you can get the cable car for Park Montjuic from there.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked the room through hotels.com and got a room with two twin size beds. The room was a decent size and was cleaned every time I got back to the hotel. It is a few minutes away from the metro and has quite a few restaurants around it. The staff was very friendly and spoke English very well. Would recommend !
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean comfort hotel, Quite in the middel of the centre and a very short walking to La Ramla. Easy to reach by Metro from the airport. Just one change. And close to the metro station to go to other activities. Good breakfirstbufe.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I always leave a balanced view or try to so here goes.Visited for 3 nights with my wife my overall impression yes it’s a budget hotel BUT very underwhelmed.Shower - No extractor fan mentioned it at reception said they don’t have any and leave door open. Not adequate as it steamed whole room up.Room - Very basic but get what you pay for. Walls like paper never been in a hotel like it and I am well travelled!! Could hear doors shutting, people in neighbouring rooms talking they were so thin....shower leaked did not butter to report it as reception did not seem bothered.Hardly any views of the outside world like being in a cave, very little light or windows.Breakfast - Quite a good choice juices, croissants, bread, cheese meat etc. But hot drinks out of paper cups not good.Location - Good 25 mins from centre and 25 mins from Olympic stadium. Would we stay again NO as really is so basic it felt like a hostel.Good luck
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel as a surprise 5-night get away for my girlfriends birthday.I have stayed around the Paralel area on a previous trip to Barcelona. I knew the location was spot on to go just about anywhere in the city so therefore I booked this hotel.Firstly, don’t let the 2-Star hotel rating put you off. This hotel is nicer than some 4-Star hotels I’ve stayed in. It’s spotlessly clean in the rooms and around the hotel. The decor looks cheap but modern and nice enough. The hotel is a 2 minute walk from Paralel metro which will get you just about everywhere in the city. It’s very close to a strips of restaurants and bars up all the side streets around the hotel and only around 20 minute walk to La Rambla & the docks.On to the negatives. I found a couple of the reception staff quite unfriendly and rude. We were never greeted (“good morning/good evening”) and when we arrived there wasn’t so much as a ‘hi’ or an introduction to the hotel or area. We were just instantly asked for our passports, a long pause and then told we would have to come back later at 3pm as our room wasn’t ready. I was happy to just leave my bags and go for a walk but a little bit more of an explanation wouldn’t have gone a miss. One of my main reasons for marking the scoring down is the fact that there is no shower room. The check out time on our last day was 11am (I thought this was more than reasonable), however our flight wasn’t until 9:30pm. When asking the reception if there were shower factories available to us when we came back to pick up our bags after making the most of our final day, they laughed in my face and just shook their heads. I didn’t think this was an unreasonable request and something I have always been offered in every hotel I’ve stayed in.Overall this is a reasonably priced hotel and I do think it’s star rating should be higher. Barcelona is a great city and this is a good base to see all the sites.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Within walking distance of attractions, grocery stores, bike rental, water front, stores, and lots more. Clean room, hallways, elevators, all very modern. The staff are all extra pleasant, friendly and efficient.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is strategically located to all the the most popular tourist sites in Barcelona. If you enjoy walking , as I do, you'll know the first day you made the right choice of this moderately priced hotel.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When I book a short break or holiday I tend to rely much more on Trip Advisor rather than rely on the blurb in brochures/websites or official hotel star ratings and yet again Trip Advisor came up trumps with Paral-lel in Barcelona.For a 2 star hotel it completely exceeded my expectations.A modern clean reception with friendly staff.Our room (122) was a suite. We had 2 double bedrooms, a huge bathroom and a tiny terrace. The terrace probably ideal if you are a smoker. It's very small so wouldn't have much use for anything else. It was huge for just the 2 of us. Our room had everything we could have wanted. Reasonably priced minibar, safe, tea and coffee making facilities, TV and air. Con. It was spotlessly clean and well presented and was modern. A bonus was at night we didn't hear a single thing outside I which is great as we were city centre and expected some noise at night. Breakfast was on the 1st floor and set up as a buffet style with lots of choice. Yogurts, fresh fruits, sweet pastries, bread with cold meats and cheese, cereal and a small selection of an English breakfast option too. Do not be put off by the fact that this hotel is a 2 star. This can be down to little things such as no fitness centre or just the road its on etc. it in no way reflects the quality of the hotel which was fantastic. Location wise you are a 5 minute walk from the harbor and La Rambla
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient location near the Metro which makes going around easy. Supermarket is located next door which is great and there are also many restaurants nearby the hotel and also within about 10 minutes walking distance. Hotel room was spacious and clean, and the bed was very comfortable. Would be happy to stay here again!
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely hotel in a walkable district. Friendly quick check in. Room large and clean with good air conditioning. Very comfortable! Lots of reasonably priced restaurants in the area and easy walking distance to the port.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel ... very clean .. friendly staff .. excellent breakfast!! Great location, queit at night, I loved the terrace!!Would recommend, thanks for a great stay!! :)With phone map directions it was very easy to find.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It may be a two star hotel,but it offers everything you need .Next to metro station close to most important sights, clean ,comfortable bed and most importantly genuinely polite and helpful staff. I would stay there again.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I go to Barcelona every year, and my favorite hotels are all getting ridiculously expensive, so I tried Hotel Paral-lel because it is just a block from the Metro that goes directly from the train station and just about any place you will want to go to. It is also in the ‎Eixample neighborhood which I have been comfortable with. It is about a mile from Placa Espana and not too far from Placa de Gracia, which is just one metro station away. The staff was very helpful and friendly. I stayed with a friend in a twin bed room. Everything was very clean. We were able to set the air conditioning easily. For a modest hotel, I was surprised at the quality of the breakfast, and there was always something sweet in the lobby when we returned from a long day of touring. I will certainly stay there again.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had stayed at Hotel Paralel for four nights. During the second night I had returned to my hotel room to discover a personal hygiene tool had been placed in the bidet and cleaning solutions were left in the sink. We understand it is starting at peak season and staff have a lot on their plates but in our opinion this is unacceptable as it is a direct issue on my personal hygiene - to put it in a similar example it is the equivalent of putting somebody's toothbrush in the bidet. I raised our concerns via email to the hotel inbox (which we never received a response to) and also to the hotel manager, Juan, the next morning. Juan was less than empathetic and in fact, was rude and condescending. As a customer service manager myself, this is completely shocking and again, unacceptable. To quote him I was making it a big deal, it is a human error, what did we expect him to do about it. It was a struggle asking him for the next level manager's contact information, and even then, it took a week to receive a response. The response I received was I was not going to receive any form of compensation for my experience and if I should return to the hotel I would be offered a drink. I had also reached out to NN hotels group social media and have not received a response. I am utterly disappointed in my experience in hotel parallel, yes it is travel peak season (which reflects in the room premium price we've paid), but this is not an excuse to disregard guest experience. My network of family and friends are frequent travelers and many are actually in the travel industry. I have a reunion of 20 who will be travelling to Barcelona next March and we will be sure to not stay in hotel Paralel and hotels relating to this group.
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When You Think You Can't Be More surprised, you come across again with an amazing reception hospitality from Joan.... (long hair and beard guy) he is so friendly and professional, one thing I like in this place.. second time I come here and they always gives us a great room, first time was 215 this time room 502 (amazing)Internet Is Quick, and although the check in time is at 3pm we always arrive around 10 and by 1pm we have our rooms ready.Also You Will love the large selection of food for breakfast, keep it in mind this is 2stars hotel.. but in London standards is 4!!ENJOY Your Stay :)Kind RegardsPedro Caballero Clemente
hotelName:
30    Hotel Paral.lel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A lovely hotel, room and breakfast, with in walking distance of many bars, restaurants and tapas bars. An interesting walk up to the old town with many streets and ramblers to explore before arriving at the main rambler. Would definately stay again on returning to Barcelona.
